Agyanino lalakiya mingngan si Jose a taga-Arimatea a tata lubbun sino probinsiya a Judea. Nalawad anna naggaddangnga tolay a aggataron sino gumamwanganino patturayani Dios. Massiki tata a pangafuwanna Judyu, ammena anggammino planowino bafulunnera andino inangwara ki Jesus.
Inangngi Jose ki Pilato a narang sino baggiyi Jesus,
kasena inang neyulluwino baggina sino krus e binaꞌbattanna si nafurawa sinnun. Neyekwana sino tanamma neyabbut si batuwa kunnangke agwefa ammena kepay neusar.
Wasin pangwanna sinay, araꞌniyenna mangiyafuweno awna aggimwangan, se fuwamma Biyernes a awa pidadananino Judyuwera sino awanda sino awna aggimwangan.
Ino bafabbayira a nebulun ki Jesus a naggabwat sey Galilea, dinandananda i Jose e initareno agyananneno tanam andino niyekwani Jose sino baggiyi Jesus.
Wasinoy, nanawira ta umanda idadanino lana anna bambanguwa iyekwarana sino baggina. Udde sino kadaramaꞌna a awna aggimwangan, nagyanira sino balera a mimwang, se antuweno lintiyino Judyuwera.
Wasi awna Linggu, naggiꞌbattino bafabbayira a inang sino tanammi Jesus e neyangkalindeno bambanguwa nedadanda.
Wasin ginamwangira sinay, initara si naariyennino batuwa aggakuꞌneno tanam,
e sinallungira, udde ammera nadaꞌngeno baggiyi Afu Jesus.
Nakungkulino nakanda a maddandam sinaya nakwa. Kakaꞌmeng kelanga nappaddeno adwera a lallakiya mangngilikilitino barawasira a nakitaꞌdag sikwara.
Nokabbino bafabbayira gafu sino nappelalota talora, udde sinapitino lallakiyera sikwara si, “Mayan tufukandawino nabiyag sino agyananino natay?
Awaninni Jesus sitaw, se nangngangoliyen. Ma, nakalyawandawino sinapiꞌna sikwayu sin nagyanandaw sey Galilea
a maawag si meyalawatino Abbingnga Tolay sino minalliwatira ta ilansara sino krus, udde mangngangolina sino mekatalluwa aw?”
E nadandandeno sinapiti Jesus.
Wasin nuliyera, sinapiꞌda sino karattaddayira a adalani Jesus andino bafulundereno nakwa.
Inayira a bafabbay, da Maria Magdalena, i Juana, anni Maria a ina i Santiago, e ana kappay korwanira a bulunda. Ireno inang nituldu sino apostolira sino nakwa,
udde amme kinuruwino apostolireno sinapiꞌda, se aridda si sinenaꞌda pelang.

Udde i Pedro, nalayawa inang sino agyananino tanam. Wasin ginamwang sinay, inokabba nisirib sino dolammeno tanam, udde awana initana, ino pelang sinnuna nepamaꞌbaꞌda. E inanawa aggadandam nu sanneno nakwa sino baggiyi Jesus.
Sinoy kappaya aw, agyanino adwera a nebulun ki Jesus siꞌina umang sey Emaus a nasuruk si karattaddaya kilometroweno kaaroyuna sey Jerusalem.
Wasin aggelakalakarira, pattatabbandeno ammina nakwa.
Wasin aggetatabbira kepay, inaraꞌniyi Jesus e nebulun sikwara.
Udde massiki initara, ammera naimunuwan, se kunnangke wara nallefang sino matara.
Sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Sanneno pattatabbandoya?”
Nitturira, e maitengke si malowino nakanda.
E sinapitino tata sikwara a i Cleopas si, “Ikka pelang nakuyino magyan sey Jerusalem a ammena kepay nangammu sino nakwa sinay sino nallaꞌwuta aw.”
“Sanneno nakwa?” kunni Jesus.
“Ino nakwa ki Jesus a taga-Nazaret,” nesombaꞌda. “Tata a gumalabbun, e maita si anggammanni Dios gafu sino pannakadamana a manuldu anna mangwa si kakkaꞌbaw, e anggammangkappayino tolayira.
Udde ino pangafuwanirana padi andino matturayira sikwatam, neyalawaꞌda sino gubernador ta masentensiyana matay, e nelansara sino krus.
Antuweno ininnanamamiya misalaꞌngad sikwatama gakagaka i Israel. E sitoya, mekatalluwa awin kiyad sin nakwannenay.
Ino kappay tata, nakkaꞌbokami sino sinapitino korwanira a bulummiya bafabbay. Naggiꞌbattira a inang sino tanamma,
udde ammera kanu nadaꞌngeno baggina. E nuliyera a massapit si ana kanuweno nappadda a anghel sikwara a nituldu si nangngangoliyen.
Inang kappayino korwanira a bulummi sino tanam e gakkuruwino sinapitino bafabbayira, se ammera kappay inita i Jesus.”
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Ikkayuwa kurangino annandamma! Mayan madyata kuruwandawino ammina sinapitino gumalabbunira?
Maawatandonad si maawa madyatanino Kristo, kasena medayaw.”
E nepakaawati Jesus sikwareno anggamma sapitan amminino neturakka sapiti Dios mappeafu sikwana, mangiyafu sino palunguwera a neturakki Moises kiyad sino ammina neturakkino gumalabbunira.
Wasin araꞌniyeran sino lubbuna umangnganda, ituluy kepenaddi Jesus a mallakad,
udde sinawiranda, e sinapiꞌda sikwana si, “Middetamun sitaw, se gafenin.” Antuweno inang sikwara.
Wasin mangnganiran, nappa i Jesus si tinapay e nappasalamat ki Dios, kasena ginaradwa e neyaꞌdana sikwara.
E kunnangke naariyennino nallefang sino matara e naimunuwandan, udde kakaꞌmeng kelanga naawan.
E nakkakibikibebutira si, “Antu kappay, se nallawarino nakanta sin agyanantam sey dalan sin pitulduwanna sikwata sino neturakka sapiti Dios.”
Ginikkatiran e nuliyera sey Jerusalem. Dinaꞌngareno karattaddayira a adalanna andino korwanira a nakkakarampat sinay.
Sinapitino adalanira si, “Gakkuruwa nangngangoliyi Afu Jesus, se nappadda ki Simon!”
E sinapippayino adwereno nakwa sikwara sino dalan annino nimunuwanda ki Jesus sin naggaradwanna sino tinapay.
Wasin aggedamadamikkepayino adwera, kakaꞌmeng kelanga nappadda i Jesus sino naraꞌlanganda. “Nasiyanaꞌngaddino nakandaw,” kunna sikwara.
Udde nalaꞌgatira e nakatalawirangke, se aridda si baniyino initara.
Antuweno nassapitanna sikwara si, “Mayan nakatalokayu? Mayan maddaladudwakayu si gakkuruwa nangngangoliyak?
Itandaw yo kamakku anda yo takkik ta kuruwandaw si gakkuruwa ikkanak. Gafutandak ta manguruggayu. Se ino banig, awana baggi anna tulangnga, gampade ana sikwak, e damayuwa itan.”
Wasin sinapiꞌnenay, nepaitana sikwareno kamaꞌna andino takkina.
Udde ammera kepay kinurug gafu se nappelalotino kaꞌbora andino aangganda, antuweno sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Wara maakkan sitan?”
Inaꞌdanda si sinunuwa lamis,
e nakkanna sino aꞌlanda.

Wasinoy, sinapiꞌna sikwara si, “Inayira a nakwa, ireno sinapikku sikwayu sin nagyanangku kepay sikwayu siꞌin, a maawag si meyakkurug amminino neturakki Moises andino gumalabbunira andino ana sino leburuwa Salmo mappeafu sikwak.”
E winaldanneno nakanda takesi maawatandeno neturakka sapiti Dios,
e sinapiꞌna sikwara si, “Kunnayawino neturak mappeafu sikwak. Maawag si madyatan anna matayino Kristo, kasena mangngangoli sino mekatalluwa aw.
Maawaggappay si mebanyag si ammina lubbun sito lubagga mangiyafu sito Jerusalem si pakomani Diosino liwatino tolayira a mabboboli sino liwaꞌdera gafu sino angngurudda sikwak.
Ikkayuneno manaꞌdag si gakkuruwa nakwa sikwak ammin inaya neturak.
Dundunangkuna sikwayuweno Espirituwi Dios a nekariyi Amak. Mattarongkayu sito Jerusalem kiyad si meyaꞌda sikwayuweno pannakadama a maggabwat sey langit.”
Wasinoy, nefuyuꞌnera sey Betania. Wasin ginamwangira sinay, netayangngeno kamaꞌna a mamindisiyon sikwara.
Wasin aggebibindisiyonannera kepay, inanawannera se netulluwen sey langit.
E naddayawira sikwana, kasera nuli sey Jerusalem a nappelalotino aangganda.
E kanayunirana maꞌang sino Templo a maddayaw ki Dios.
John: Sin liyeya naparatu yo lubag, anennino naingnganan si Sapita
mangipakaammu ki Dios. Iyawa Sapit, nekanayun ki Dios, se antu, Dios kappepay.
Anen inaya Sapit ki Dios sin awangkepaya naparatu.
Antuweno nepamaratuwi Dios si ammin, e awaningke a naparatu, nu bakkanna gafu sikwana.
E antu kappayino paggabwatanino biyangnga amammina meyamparig si sirwata mawwaldag sino nakammino tolayira.
Iyawa sirwat, waldanneno lammuka ana sino tolayira, e ino lammuk, ammena makaaddap sinaya sirwat.
Agyanino tolaya dinunduni Dios a mingngan si Juan.
Ino nanundunani Dios sikwana, ipakaammuneno sirwat takesi ammina tolay, dingngagganda e kuruwanda nad.
Bakkanni Juanino sirwat, nu ammena lud ginamwang pelanga mipakaammu mappeafu sinaya sirwat.
Se aneno ginamwang kappaya antuweno gakkuruwa sirwata mawwaldag sino ammina nakammino tolayira.
Inaya naingnganan si Sapit, inang sito lubag, e massiki antuweno nepamaratuwi Dios sino tolayira, ammera kappay naimunuwan.
Massiki inang sino gakkuruwa lubbunna, inammera kappay.
Udde agyampayino nanggammira sikwana e nanguruwira. Ireno niyaꞌdanna si kalintiyana mabbali si abbingi Dios.
Ino nabbaliyanda si abbingi Dios, bakkannino gagangena tolaya meyanak sito lubag, se ammena naggabwat sino gakkanna tolaya mabbing, nu ammena lud naggabwat sino pannakadama i Dios a Amara.

Inaya Sapit, nabbali si tolay e nakilubbun sikwami. Minangkallakka tolay e passiyingke a gakkuruwino sinapiꞌna. Initamiyeno kinalawanna a antuweno kinalawarino tatatata ke a Abbingi Dios a naggabwat sino Amana.
Nassapiti Juan mappeafu sikwana, nekunna si, “Antuwen yawino sinapikku sin nassapitangku sikwayu si, ‘Ino metufad sikwak, nangatu amma sikwak, se anen massiki sin ammek kepay neyanak.’ ”
Gafu sino dokalla angngikallaꞌnga, kanayuna madadaggananino nalawara iyaꞌdana sikwatama mangurug.
Ino lintiyi Dios ino nepakaammuwi Moises, udde ino nepaita i Jesu Kristo, antuweno kakuruwan mappeafu ki Dios annino angngikallaꞌnga sikwatam.
Awaningke a tolaya nakaita ki Dios, udde ino tatatata ke a Abbingnga a kakunnana a agyan sikwana, antuweno nipakaammu mappeafu ki Amana.
Wasinoy, aneno papadiyera andino Levitera a kaduffunanda a inang ki Juan. Dinundunireno pangafuwanirana Judyu sey Jerusalem ki Juan ta ibebuꞌda nu sanneno katolena.
Amme neyimaddi Juanino kakuruwan, nu ammena lud nepunnuwa nassapit si, “Bakkannakino Kristo a dinunduni Dios.”
“Inyaka mat?” kunda sikwana. “Ikka nalangi Elias a gumalabbun siꞌina kunda si muli kappay?”
“Bakkan,” kunni Juan.
E nekunda kappay si, “Tantaro nu ikkeno gumalabbuna aggataronammi?”
“Bakkampay,” kunna.
“Nu kunnenoy, inyaka mat? Ituldum mantu ta warana a sapitammi sino nanundunira sikwami. Sanneno sapitannu mappeafu sikwam?”
“Ikkanakino neyakkuruwanino neturakki Isaias a gumalabbun siꞌina sapitanna si wara magyan sey kalolowata mikulawu sino tolayira si, ‘Pallawarandawino dalana pangannanino Afutama gumamwang.’ ”
Wara so kunnenoy, inayira a dinundunino Fariseowera,
kunda kappay ki Juan, “Nu bakkangkeno Kristo onnu i Elias onnu ino gumalabbuna gumamwang, sangka lang mantuwa mamawtisar?”
Sinabbi Juan si, “Danum pelangino pamawtisarku sino tolayira, udde ana sikwayu sito ingkeinino ammeyu naimunuwan nu inya.
Antuweno metufad sikwak. Ino kakuruwanna, massiki ino muttad sino gakanneno sapatuꞌna, ammena meannunga akwangku se medayawingke amma sikwak.”
Amminira yawa nakwa, nakwera ammin sey Betania sino dammangngeno wawwanga Jordan a nababbawtisarani Juan.
Waso kadaramaꞌnenoy, inita i Juani Jesus a umaraꞌni, e sinapiꞌna si, “Itandaw lud, antuyanino karnerowa neyaꞌda i Dios a mewaꞌlat takesi ariyanneno liwaꞌna tolayira sito lubag.
Antuyanino sinapikkuwa metufad sikwaka nangatu amma sikwak, se anen massiki sin ammek kepay neyanak.
Massiki ikkanak siꞌin, ammek naimunuwan nu inya. Udde ino gakkagguwa mamawtisar sino tolayira si danum, takesi mepakaammu sikwayuwa gakagaka i Israel si antuweno dinunduni Dios.”

Nepakaammuwi Juanino nakwa e sinapiꞌna si, “Sin pittana, ammek gakkuruwa naimunuwan nu inya, udde i Dios a nanundun sikwaka mamawtisar sino tolayira si danum, sinapiꞌna sikwak si, ‘Maitammeno Espirituk a maddassag sino tata tolay ta magyan sikwana, e antuneno mamawtisar sino tolayira sino Espirituk.’ E gakkuruwa initakino Espirituwi Dios a kunnangke kalapatiya naddassag ki Jesus e nagyan sikwana.

Nepakaammuwi Juanino nakwa e sinapiꞌna si, “Sin pittana, ammek gakkuruwa naimunuwan nu inya, udde i Dios a nanundun sikwaka mamawtisar sino tolayira si danum, sinapiꞌna sikwak si, ‘Maitammeno Espirituk a maddassag sino tata tolay ta magyan sikwana, e antuneno mamawtisar sino tolayira sino Espirituk.’ E gakkuruwa initakino Espirituwi Dios a kunnangke kalapatiya naddassag ki Jesus e nagyan sikwana.
Gafu sino nitangku sinay, itaꞌdaggu si antuweno Abbingi Dios.”
Waso kadaramaꞌna kappay inoy, agyanda Juan annino adwera a adalanna.
Nedipaꞌna i Jesus a mattaꞌlib, e sinapiꞌna si, “Antuwenayino karnerowa neyaꞌda i Dios a mewaꞌlat.”
Wasin diningngaggino adwera a adalanino sinapiti Juan, dinandanira ki Jesus.
Nallangiyi Jesus, initanera a dumandan, e nebebuꞌna si, “Wara sapitandaw?”
E sinabbadda si, “Rabbi, sintawino pagyanannu?” (Ino anggamma sapitannino Rabbi, Mesturu.)
E sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Intam ta maitayu.” Antu gafuna, nebulunira ki Jesus e inanda initeno pagyananna, e nagyanira sinay si alas kwatro kiyad si gafi.
Ino tata sikwara a naningngag sino sinapiti Juan anna dinandan ki Jesus, i Andres a kolaki Simon Pedro.
Kinangkamanna a sinufuki Simon e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Sinumpalammiyeno Mesias.” (Ino anggamma sapitan, ino Kristo a dinunduni Dios sito lubagga matturay.)
Neiyangnga i Simon ki Jesus. Sinulangngani Jesusi Simon, kasena sinapit sikwana si, “Ikka i Simon a abbingi Juan. Nganandakana si Cefas.” (Iyawa angan, kakunna i Pedro a ino anggamma sapitan, batu.)

Waso metufara aw, dinandammi Jesus a umang sey probinsiya a Galilea. Sinumpalannani Felipe a kalubbunanda Andres anni Pedro a taga-Betsaida, e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Mebulungka sikwak ta mabbalika si adalangku.”

Waso metufara aw, dinandammi Jesus a umang sey probinsiya a Galilea. Sinumpalannani Felipe a kalubbunanda Andres anni Pedro a taga-Betsaida, e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Mebulungka sikwak ta mabbalika si adalangku.”

I Felipe, inangnga inintufuki Natanael, e wasin sinumpalanna, nekunna sikwana si, “Sinumpalamminnino tolaya neturakki Moises sino leburuwa neturakkanino lintig anna neturak kappayino gumalabbunira siꞌin. Antuwi Jesus a taga-Nazaret a abbingi Jose.”
Sinabbi Natanael si, “Ma, wara kad nalawad si maggabwat sey Nazaret?”
“Anta lud ta itannu,” kunni Felipe.
Wasin inita i Jesusi Natanael a umaraꞌni, sinapiꞌna si, “Antuwenayino gakkuruwa gaka i Israel a awaningke nassisiriyanna.”
“Sanneno nangammuwannu sikwak?” kunni Natanael.
E kunni Jesus sikwana si, “Initatakan sin aggatutturannu sino fungalla kayuwa igos sin ammeraka kepay inayani Felipe.”
“Afu, ikka maꞌlurino Abbingi Dios,” kunni Natanael, “ikkeno Ariya aggataronammi sito Israel.”
E nekunni Jesus si, “Ma, kuruwannumpay si ikkanaki Kristo gafu sino nassapitangku si initataka sino fungalla kayu? Oddu kepeneno maitayuwa kakkaꞌbaw amma sinoy.”
E sinapiti Jesus sikwara ammin si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayuwa maitayuneno langita mabukkatan andino anghelira i Dios a muluuliya maddassag anna sumullu sikwaka Abbingnga Tolay.”
Wasino mekatalluwa aw, aneno kasar sey Cana a tata a lubbunna Galilea. Ana sinayino ina i Jesus,
e naayangkappayi Jesus andino adalannera.
Wasin naambutinnino tayug,
sinapitino ina i Jesus sikwana si, “Naambutinnino tayuwa inumanda.”
E nekunni Jesus si, “Ina, ammemmad sapitannino akwangku. Ammena kepay nadaꞌngeno tiyempoka mangipaita sino pannakadamak.”
E sinapitino inana sino kaduffunandera sinay si, “Akwandaw massiki sanneno pakwana sikwayu.”
Aneno gagangena Judyu mappeafu sino fustuwa akwanda a mamaggu. Antu gafuna, aneno annammira a darokkalla angang sinaya madanuman si lima lateno kadda tata.
E kunni Jesus sino kaduffunandera si, “Pannundawino angangira si danum.” E pinannura amminino angang.
Sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Maggauggayu takesi iyandaw sino makammu sino kasaran.” Antuweno inangwara,
e nabbaliyen si tayuwino danum, e sininsimanino makammu. Gafu se ammena ammuweno naggabwatanino nalawara tayug, se ino pelang kaduffunandereno nakaammu, nepaayangngeno lalakiya makkasar,

e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Sannera yaw, se gagangayino tolayira a iyuntara a iyannayino nalawara tayug, takesi nanu nakaodduwerana ninum, kasera ilawanino narakkatta tayug. Udde ikka, tangananino inangwam se nangambutannuwa nelawanino kalalawaran.”
Inaya inangwa i Jesus sey Cana a tata a lubbunna Galilea, antuweno palunguwa kakkaꞌbawa inangwana a mangipaita sino pannakadamana. E nanguruwino adalannera sikwana.
Wasin nabalinin inoy, inanda Jesus annino inana, ino kakkolaꞌngera andino adalannera sey Capernaum. Ammera mabaya magyan sinay.
Wasin araꞌniyennino fiyestana Judyu a ngananda si Laꞌwutan, inanda Jesus sey Jerusalem.
Sinallung sino Templo, e dinaꞌnganeno mallakuwera si baka, karnero, anna kalapatiya mewaꞌlat ki Dios, andino gumatalyatira si pirak.
Nangwa i Jesus si lufira siwaꞌwaꞌna, e nepaanoneno mallakuwera, e dinulinneno ammina karnerowera andino bakera sino lawan. Newariꞌneno pirakino gumatalyatira, e iletwanna kappayino lamisaandera.
Sinapiꞌna sino gumalakuwera si kalapati si, “Ilawandawira yan! Ammeyu pabbalin si allakuwan yo balayi Amak!”
Wasin initennino adalanira i Jesusino inangwana, dinandandeno neturak sino sapiti Dios a sapitanna si, “Afu Dios, ino nappelalota angngikalok sino balem, antuneno katayangku.”
Gafu sino inangwa i Jesus sino Templo, sinapitino pangafuwanirana Judyu sikwana si, “Sanneno kakkaꞌbawa ipaitam sikwami ta ipakurungnguweno kalintiyannuwa mangwa si kunnenoy?”
Sinabbi Jesus si, “Darallandaw yo balayi Dios ta pattaꞌdaggangku kappay si tallu aw.”
“Ma?” kunnino Judyuwera. “Mepataꞌdangngu kappay si tallu aw iyawa Templo? Gampade napataꞌdag yaw si appatafulu e annamma run.”
Udde ino balayi Dios a sinapiti Jesus, ino bagginangkepay.
Antuweno wasin natayi Jesus e nangngangoli kappay, dinandammino adalannera inoya sinapiꞌna, e nattalaginarino angngurudda sino neturakka sapiti Dios annino sinapiti Jesus.
Odduweno nangurug ki Jesus sinoya nakifiyestanna sey Jerusalem, se initareno kakkaꞌbawa senyala inangwana.
Udde amme nattalakki Jesus si gakkuruwino angngurudda sikwana, gafu se ammuna amminino nakamma tolay.
Ammena maawag si wara massapit sikwana mappeafu sino tolayira, se ammunanino ana sino nakanda.
Agyanino tata a pangafuwanna Judyu a Fariseo a mingngan si Nicodemo.

Wasi tata gafi, inangngi Nicodemo ki Jesus e sinapiꞌna si, “Afu, ammumi si i Diosino nanundun sikwama manuldu sikwami. Se awaningke a makaangwa sino kakkaꞌbawa senyala inangwam nu awani Dios sikwana.”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwam, awana tolaya mesapat sino patturayani Dios nu ammena mepidwa a meyanak.”
E nebebuti Nicodemo si, “Damana kadda mepidwa a meyanakino tolay nu dokallin? Ma, damana a muli sino kuyungino inana ta meyanak kappay?”
E nekungkappayi Jesus si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwam, ammena mesapatino tolay sino patturayani Dios nu ammena meyanak si danum annino Espirituwi Dios.
Se ino iyanakino tolay, antuweno abbing inaya tolay. Udde ino mepidwa a meyanak sino Espirituwi Dios, antuweno abbingi Dios.
Ammeka mantu makkaꞌbaw sito sapitangkuwa mepidwakayu nadda meyanak.

Se massiki madyata maawatanino makwa, makwa kappay. Kakunnaneno bayabbag, ammetam ammuweno naggabwatanna onnu ino iraꞌbunna, se kiyara anggamma, antuweno pabbayabbagganna, udde madingngaddangkepayino ungungnga. Kakunna kappayino makwa sino amminira a meyanak sino Espirituwi Dios.”
E nebebukkappayi Nicodemo si, “Ansanna lang makweno kunnenoy?”
E sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Ma, ikka keneno tata a madayawa mesturu sito Israel, gampade ammengkepay maawatan yaw?
Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwam. Ino sapitammi sikwayu, antuweno inammumi annino initami. Udde ammeyu kepay kuruwan.
Nu ammeyu kinuruwino sinapikku mappeafu sino makwa sito lubag, ansandawino mangurug nu wara sapitangku mappeafu sey langit?
Awaningke a sinullu sey langit takesi itulduneno ana sinay, nu bakkannappelanga Abbingnga Tolaya naggabwat sinay.
Inona makwa sikwak, kakunneno nakwa sino sinan ulagga nedikkatti Moises si kayu e netayangnga sin nannodoyuwanda sey kalolowat.
Se ikkanak kappaya Abbingnga Tolay, maawag si melansaꞌnga sino krus anna metayak
takesi nu inyeno mangurug sikwak, maaꞌdan si biyaya mannayun,” kunni Jesus.

Gafu se nappelalotino agganggammi Dios sino tolayira sito lubag, dinundunneno tatatata ke a Abbingnga a matay, takesi ammina mangurug sikwana, ammera makastigu, nu ammera lud maaꞌdan si biyaya mannayun.
Se amme dinunduni Diosino Abbingnga sito lubag ta kastigunneno tolayira, nu ammena lud ta isalaꞌngera.
Amminira a mangurug sikwana, ammera makastigu. Udde ino ammera mangurug, naukumiran a makastiguna, se ammera mangurug sino tatatata ke a Abbingi Dios.
Antuyawino gafuna a makastiguwerana: inang sito lubaggino sirwata mawwaldag sino nakammino tolayira, udde paanggandeno lammuk amma sino sirwat, se narakkattino aggangwara.
Se ino mangwera si narakkat, kaꞌgandeno sirwat, e ammera anggamma umaraꞌni sinay, tantaro nu maiteno kinarakkaꞌda.
Udde ino tolayira a manuntul sino kakuruwan, angganda a umaraꞌni sino sirwat takesi mepaita si i Diosino naggabwatanino nalawara akwanda.
Wasin nasinduwenoy, inanda Jesus andino adalannera sey probinsiya a Judea, e nagyanira sinaya mamawtisar sino tolayira.
I Juan kappay, mamawtisar sey Enon a araꞌni sey Salim se odduwa danum sinay. Madadarandanino tolayira a umang sikwana ta mappabawtisarira,
se amme kepay nabaluri Juan sinoy.
Ino adalanira i Juan, nakitukkiyera sino tata a Judyu mappeafu sino abbawtisarda.

Gafu sino kunnenoy, inangngino adalannera sikwana, e sinapiꞌda si, “Afu, madandammuwenin bulunnu sin nagyanantam sey dammangnga Jordan a antuwenin sinapiꞌnu sikwami? Sitoya, mamawtisaringkappay, e antuweno angan amminino tolayira.”
Sinabbi Juan si, “Ammekayu maddararan sinay, se awana tolaya makaangwa si kunnenay nu amme urayi Dios.
Diningngaddawin sinapikkuwa bakkannakino Kristo, nu ammerak lud dinunduni Dios a maunta sikwana ta paddadanangkuweno tolayira a mangurug sikwana.

Ino keampariyanna, kakunneno bulunino lalakiya mangatawa a makammuwa midadan sino kasar. Massiki bakkanna antuweno mangatawa sino bafay, maanggangkappaya makikasar, se dingngagganneno sapitannino bulunna. Kunnantu, ikkanaka nidadan sino tolayira sino gamwanganino Kristo, maanggammak kappay sito ingkein.
Umoddu naddino maddayaw sikwana e bumibissangngino dumandan sikwak.”
Ino naggabwat sito lubag, akwa yo lubag pelang, e ino pelang ammuna sapitan, ino mappeafu sino ana sito lubag. Udde ino naggabwat sey langit, medayaw amma sino ammina naggabwat sito lubag.
Massiki sapitanneno initana annino diningngangnga, kunnangke awana mangurug sino sapitanna.
Udde ino manguruwira sikwana, itaꞌdadda si gakkuruwino sapiti Dios.
Se ino dinunduni Dios, awana sapitanna nu bakkampelangino nepasapiti Dios sikwana, se ana sikwaneno ammina pannakadameno Espirituwi Dios.
Gafu se nappelalotino agganggammi Dios sino Abbingnga, netalaꞌngeno ammin sikwana.
Ino mangurug sino Abbingnga, mabiyangnga si makkikiyad. Udde ino ammena mangurug sikwana, ammena maaꞌdan si biyaya mannayun, nu amme lud kastiguni Dios si makkikiyad.
Ino Fariseowera, diningngadda si oddu kanuweno dinandan ki Jesus annino binawtisarannera amma sino binawtisarani Juan.
Udde si kakurungnga, bakkanni Jesusino mamawtisar, nu bakkampelangino adalannera.
Wasin inammuwanda Jesus si kunnenayino diningngaggino Fariseowera, nanawira sey Judea ta muliyera sey Galilea.
Maawag si mallakarira sey probinsiya a Samaria,
e ginamwangira sey Sicar a tata a lubbun sinay. Inaya lubbun, araꞌni sino lubagga neyaꞌda i Jacob sino abbingnga a i Jose siꞌin.
Agyangkappay sinayino bufuna kinokkofani Jacob. Naayangnginni Jesus a mallakad se tangnganawin, e nattuttud sino arurungngenaya bufun.
E ino adalannera, inangngira sino lubbun ta maggatangira si akkananda.
Wasino inanawiran, agyanino ginamwanga bafaya taga-sinaya umang manab sino bufun, e sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Makiinumak abbuwi.”
E ino adalannera, inangngira sino lubbun ta maggatangira si akkananda.
Wasino inanawiran, agyanino ginamwanga bafaya taga-sinaya umang manab sino bufun, e sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Makiinumak abbuwi.”
“Ma, ansangka mangke makiinum sikwak, gampade Judyuka anna Samaritanak?” kunnino bafay. (Se ino Judyuwera, kaꞌganda usarannino akwana Samaritanowera.)
E netabbi Jesus si, “Nannud inammumino iyaꞌda i Dios anna nu inyaka marang si danum, ikka naddino marang sikwak ta iyaꞌdak sikwamino danuma mappabiyag.”
E sinapitino bafay si, “Afu, ataꞌnang yo bufun e awana panammu. Sintomantuweno pappannu sino danuma mappabiyag?
Lambawannu kaddino gagginafutama i Jacob a nappaillalupat sitawa bufun sikwami? Se iyawa bufun, antuweno panafanda andino anaꞌngera, anna pinumanino ayandera.”
Sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Ino uminum sito danumma yaw a bufun, mauwokappena.
Udde ino uminum sino danuma iyaꞌdak, awaninna a mauwaw sikwana. Se ino danuma iyaꞌdak, mabbali si kunnangke bitufuta ammena mabbat sino dolamma baggina, e mangaꞌda sikwana si biyaya mannayun.”
Wasinoy, kunnino bafay si, “Afu, aꞌdannaꞌmantu sino danummuwi, takesi ammekuna mauwaw anna ammekungkappena mannotonut sitawa manab.”
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Angka ayanino atawam ta mulikayu taw.”
“Awana atawak,” kunnino bafay.
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Gakkurug yan sinapiꞌnuwa awana atawam,
se namillimakana nangatawa, e ino lalakim sito ingkein, bakkanna atawam. Antuweno gakkuruwino sinapiꞌnu sikwak.”
E sinabbino bafay si, “Afu, gumalabbungka ikka. Ana mantuweno ibebukku sikwam.
Sintawino fustuwa paddayawantam ki Dios? Sitawa kulurino paddayawanino gagginafumi ki Dios. Udde ikkayuwa Judyu, sapitandaw si sey Jerusalem pelangino fustuwa paddayawantam ki Dios.”
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Kuruwannu naddino sapitangku sikwam, madatangngeno awa bakkan sito kulud anna bakkangkappay sey Jerusalemino paddayawanino tolayira ki Dios a Amatam.
Ikkayuwa Samaritano, ammeyu inammuwi Dios a dayawandaw, udde ikkamiya Judyu, ammumiyeno dayawammi se ino mangisalak si ammina tolay, neyanaka Judyu.

Ino kakuruwanna, nadatangnginnino awa ino gakkuruwira a maddayaw ki Dios, maggabwatino addayora so nakanda a bakkampelang sino bifidda ta tuntulandeno kakuruwana kinadiosna, se antuweno anggammi Dios a akwanino maddayawira sikwana.
Se i Dios, espirituwa ammena maita. Kunnantu, ino maddayaw sikwana, dayawanna nad sino nakamma a tuntulanneno gakkuruwa kinadiosna.”
Wasinoy, kunnino bafay si, “Ammukun si gumamwangngeno Mesias a mingngan si Kristo, e ipakaammuneno ammina ammetam inammu.”
Netabbi Jesus si, “Ino sinapiꞌnuwa gumamwang, ikkanak inaya makitatabbag sikwam.”

Wasin aggedamadamikkepayi Jesus, ginamwangino adalannera. Nakkaꞌbawira a nita ki Jesus a makitatabbag si bafay. Udde awan sikwara a nappakibebut nu sanneno awanna bafay onnu nu sanneno gafuna a makitatabbi Jesus sikwana.
Waso kunnenoy, inanawanino bafayino gafana e nuli sino lubbunda. Sinapiꞌna sino kalubbunannera si,
“Antam itanino lalakiya nassapit sikwak sino ammina inangangwak. Adasi antuweno Kristo a dinunduni Dios?”
E inangngira ammin sino agyanani Jesus.
Wasin aꞌanawino bafay, sinapitino adalanira i Jesus sikwana si, “Afu, mayan ammeka mangngan?”
Udde sinapiꞌna si, “On, se aneno akkanangkuwa ammeyu ammu.”
Antuweno nakkakibikibebutino adalannera si, “Warada niyang si akkananna?”
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Ino akkanangkuwa mamiyag sikwak, antuweno pangwangku sino anggammino nanundun sikwak anna balinangkuweno nepakwana sikwak.

Aneno assapitandawa ‘Appata dakkino taronan, kasena aggarani.’ Udde ino sapitangku sikwayu, aggaraniyen sito ingkein. Itandonaddino tolayira a umaraꞌni sikwatam. Ireno ampariyangku si maganiyen nad ingkein.

Antuweno nalawad nu iyafuyunnino maggani. Gakkuruwa malabutangkayuna sino akwandawa mappakurug sino tolayira sikwak takesi maaꞌdanira si biyaya mannayun. Kunnantu, ino nabbiniyera sino sapiti Dios, makilanggakira sikwayuwa maggarani.
Gakkuruggappayino assapitanda si, ‘Tateno mabbini, tangananino maggani.’
Dinunduntakayuwa maggani sino ammeyu nayangngan, e sitoya, malabutangkayuwa maggani sino nayangnganino korwanira.”
Odduwera a Samaritano sinaya lubbuna nangurug ki Jesus gafu sino nassapitanino bafay si, “Sinapiꞌna sikwakino ammina inangangwak.”
Antu gafuna, wasin inangngira ki Jesus, inaranda si magyan nad sikwara. E nagyan sinay si adwa aw.
Oddu kappayino nangurug sikwana gafu sino tulduna.

E sinapiꞌda sino bafay si, “Ino angngurummi sito ingkein, bakkampelanga gafu sino sinapiꞌnu, nu ammena lud gafu se diningngammiyeno tulduna, e ammumin si gakkuruwa antuweno dinunduni Dios a mangisalak si ammina tolay sito lubag.”
Wasin adwa awinda Jesus sinay, nanawira sey Samaria, e inangngira sey probinsiya a Galilea a antuweno naddokallanna.
I Jesusingkepayino nassapit si, “Awana gumalabbun si dayawannino kalubbunannera.”
Udde wasin ginamwangira sey Galilea, maanggammino kalubbunannera a nappagamwang sikwana, se initara amminino kakkaꞌbawa inangwana sey Jerusalem sin nakifiyestanda sinay.
Waso kunnenoy, nulira Jesus sey Cana a lubbunna Galilea a antu kappayino nappabaliyanna sino danum si tayug. Ana sinayino tata ofisiyalna gubiyernuwa matakitino abbingnga a lalaki sey Capernaum.
Wasin diningngaggino ofisiyal si ginamwangi Jesus sey Galilea a naggabwat sey Judea, inang nappekakallak sikwana ta umangngad sey Capernaum ta pabbattunoyanneno abbingnga a gapapatayin.
E sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Ammeyu maꞌlud mangurug nu awana itandaw si kakkaꞌbaw.”
Udde sinapikkappayino ofisiyal si, “Afu, anta lud, tantaro nu matayino abbingku.”
“Umanokan,” kunni Jesus, “nabbattunoyinnino abbingngu.” Kinurungngeno sinapiti Jesus, e nanawin.
Wasin agyangkepay sino dalan sino metufara aw,
dinambalneno aripannera a umang mipakaammu sino nabbattunoyanino abbingnga.
Nebebuꞌna nu kanseno nabbattunoyanna. E kunda si, “Madikig singgafiyeno naariyanneno patuna.”
Nadandammino ama si antuweno oratta nassapitani Jesus si, “Nabbattunoyinnino abbingngu.” Antu gafuna, amminira a taabbalay, nanguruwira ki Jesus.
Antuwenayino mekadwa a kakkaꞌbawa senyala inangwa i Jesus sey Galilea. Inangwanan inay sin nuliyanna a naggabwat sey Judea.
Wasin nabalin inoy, aneno fiyestana Judyu sey Jerusalem e inangngi Jesus a makifiyesta.
Sey Jerusalem a araꞌni sino lalamwanganino karnerowera, aneno nabissokunga addiyutana nganannino Judyuwera si Betsata.
Sino lebanna, aneno limera a kunnangke bawi,
a antuweno passiyonganino odduwera a matakita tolay. Agyanino lappat, pilay, andino natayino gadweno baggira. [Nagyanira sinaya mattaron sino pabwalanino danum,
se nu korwan kanu, aneno angheli Afu Dios a massibbuwa makkingkibung sino danum e ino mapalunguwa massibbu sinay nu makibung, maariyeno massiki sanna a takiꞌna.]
Agyanino tata a lalaki sinaya tallufulu e walu runinna matakit.
Wasin inita i Jesus, inammuwanna si nabayinna natakit, e kunna sikwana si, “Anggammuwa maari yan ikalom ya?”
E netabbino matakit si, “Afu, anggangku, udde awana misibbu sikwak nu makibungino danum. Kinakkapangkumpaya inang, udde nauntananak.”
Nekunni Jesus sikwana si, “Gumabwakkan, appannu yan afaꞌngu, e umanokan.”
Kakaꞌmeng kelanga naariyeno takiꞌna, inappaneno afaꞌnga, e nanawin.
Inoya awa nabbattunoyanna, Sabadu, a antuweno pimwanganino Judyuwera.
Antu gafuna, sinapitino pangafuwanirana Judyu sino lalakiya naariyeno takiꞌna si, “Sannu lang aggaiggamman yan afaꞌngu a kontara sino lintiddam sito awa aggimwangantam?”
E sinabbino lalaki si, “On lud, udde ino nari sino takikku, antuweno nassapit sikwak si appangkuweno afakku ta manawakun.”
E nebebuꞌda sikwana si, “Inyeno nituldu sikwam si kunnenoy?”
Udde ammena inammuwenaya lalaki nu inyeno nari sino takiꞌna, se nelallamuri Jesus sino kaodduwanna tolay e inalluweta inanaw.
Ammena nabayag, dinaꞌnga i Jesusino lalaki sino Templo, e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Itannu, nabbattunoykan. Ammekampena malliwat takesi awanimpena a kura narakkatta makwa sikwam.”
Wasinoy, inanawino lalaki e inangnga sinapit sino pangafuwanirana Judyu si i Jesusino nari sino takiꞌna.
Antuweno nangiyafuwanda a nilopalopetan ki Jesus, se kunnenayino inangwana so awa aggimwanganda.
E sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “I Dios a Amak, ammena ibbattanino tarabafuna a mimut si tolay massiki sino awna aggimwangan, e antu naggappayino akwangku.”

Wasin sinapiꞌneno kunnenoy, nambubungutino pangafuwanirana Judyu sikwana e angganda si papatayanda, se ammena pelang kinontareno lintig mappeafu sino awna aggimwangan, nu ammena kappelud nekunnaneno baggina ki Dios sino nassapitanna si Amana i Dios.

Wasinoy, sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu. Ikkanaka Abbingi Dios, awana damaka akwan nu ikkanappelang itata, nu ammeꞌlubbelang akwanino itangkuwa akwani Ama. Se ammina akwani Ama, antu kappayino akwangku.
Se i Ama, anggammandaka Abbingnga, antuweno ipaitana sikwak ammina akwanna. E ana kappeneno ipakwana sikwaka kakkaꞌbaw amma sinaya inangwak takesi makkaꞌbokayu pena.
Se i Ama, pangngangolinneno natay, e kunna kappeneno akwangkuwa Abbingnga, se biyayangkuneno anggangkuwa biyayan.
Se bakkanni Ameno mangukum si massiki sanna a tolay, nu ammena lud neyaꞌda sikwaka Abbingngeno kalintiyana mangukum,
takesi dayawandaꞌngeno ammina tolay a kunna payino addayora ki Ama. Ino ammena maddayaw sikwak, ammera kappay dayawanni Ama a nanundun sikwak.

“Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, ino maddingngag sino sapitangku anna manguruggappay sino nanundun sikwak, mabiyangnga si makkikiyad. Ammenana makastigu se nalliꞌwen sino kakastiguwan si katayan, e naaꞌdanin si biyaya mannayun.

Gakkuruggappay yo sapitangku sikwayu. Ino ammina tolay, kunnangke natayira se nekatwayira ki Dios. Udde nadaꞌngennino awa massiki ino kunnangke natayira, dingngaggandeno sapitangkuwa Abbingi Dios, e nu manguruwira sino diningngadda, biyayangkuwera si makkikiyad.
Se i Ama pelangino mangaꞌda si biyag, e kunna kappay sikwaka Abbingnga, se neyaꞌdana sikwakino kalintiyana mangaꞌda si biyag.
E neyaꞌdana kappay sikwaka Abbingngeno kalintiyana mangukum sino tolayira, se ikkanakino Abbingnga Tolay.
Ammekayu nad makkaꞌbaw sito sinapikku, se madaꞌnganeno awa amminira a natay, dingngaggandaneno damikku,
e mangngangoliyerana ammin. Ino nangwera si nalawad, maaꞌdanirana si biyaya mannayun, udde ino nangwera si narakkat, maukumirana anna makastiguwerana si makkikiyad.

Awana damaka akwan nu ikkanappelanga itata. Sino pangukumangku sino tolayira, kanayungkuwa tuntulannino sapitanni Ama sikwak. Antu gafuna, fustuweno akwangkuwa mangukum, se bakkannino anggangkuweno tuntulangku, nu bakkannino panggammanino nanundun sikwak.”
“Nu ikkanappelangino mamakurug sino baggikungkepay, ammena nalang makuruwino sapitangku.
Udde ana kappayi Ama a mamakurug mappeafu sikwak, e ammuk si gakkuruwino sapitanna.
“Aneno dinundundawa inang ki Juan a nappakibebut sikwana, e sinapiꞌneno kakuruwan mappeafu sikwak.
Ammek karug awannino tolaya mamakurug mappeafu sikwak, udde nepadandangku pelang sikwayuweno sinapiti Juan takesi kuruwandonad e mesalakangkayu.
I Juan, meamparig si massirwata lampara, se ino tulduna, nawwaldag sino nakammino tolayira. Maanggangkayuwa naningngag sino tulduna si bisangnga tiyempo.
Udde sitoya, aneno mamakurug sikwayu si gakkuruwino sapitangku e nadadammat amma sino sinapiti Juan. Ino akwangkuwera a ipakwa i Ama sikwak, ireno mappakurug si i Ameno nanundun sikwak.
I Ama a nanundun sikwak, antuwengkepayino mamakurug mappeafu sikwak, udde ammeyungke diningngaggino damiꞌna anna ammeyu kappay initeno akkakokwana.
Ammeyu nepattalaginarino sapiꞌna sino nakandaw se ammeyu mangurug sikwaka dinundunna.
Adaadalandawino sapiti Dios a nepeturaꞌnga siꞌin se natalanggaggayu si sumpalandaw sinayino kabiyayandaw si makkikiyad. Ikkanakino nasapit sinaya neturak,
udde ammeyu kepay anggamma mangurug sikwak takesi aꞌdantakayu nad si biyaya mannayun.
“Ammek tarakannino pidayawanino tolayira sikwak,
udde ammuk si ino kedayawandawino tarakandaw se awaningke agganggandaw ki Dios.
Ino inangngangku sitaw, dinundundaki Ama si pannakabaggina, udde inammerak. Gampade nu wara korwana gumamwanga urenangkepay, antuweno iyataldaw.
Ammeyungke dama a mangurug sikwak, se ino pelang anggandaw, ino pakkadayadayawandawingkepay, e ammeyu tarakannino pidayawan naddino gakkuruwa Dios sikwayu.
Ammeyu nad dandamman si ikkanakino midarum sikwayu ki Ama, se ino midarum sikwayu ino neturakki Moises. Innanamandaw si mesalakangkayu nu kuruwandaw inaya neturaꞌnga, udde ammeyu kinurug,
se nannud kinuraddaw inay, kuruwandak kappenad, se ikkanakino nasapit sinaya neturaꞌnga.
Udde gafu se ammeyu kinurug inaya neturaꞌnga, ansandawino mangurug nu sapitangku pelang?”
Wasin nallaꞌwutino pipidya aw, naddammanda Jesus andino adalannera sino bebaya Galilea a ngananda kappay si bebaya Tiberias.
Odduwera a tolaya dinandan sikwara, se initareno kakkaꞌbawa inangwana sino natakitira.
Nanuꞌdura Jesus sino kulud e nattutturira sinay.
Sinoya aw, araꞌniyennino fiyestana Judyu a ngananda si Laꞌwutan.
Wasin nedipati Jesusino odduwera a tolaya umang sino agyananda, sinapiꞌna ki Felipe si, “Sintawino pappantam si ipakkantam sino tolayira ya?”
Ammuwi Jesusino akwanna, udde nebebuꞌna pelang inay, ta pangitanna nu sanneno akwani Felipe.
E sinabbi Felipe si, “Massiki pipidya a rifuweno
iyatantam si akkananda, ammena makabalin sikwara, massiki aggabisangnganda pelang.”
Wasinoy, sinapitino tata adalanna a i Andres a kolaki Simon Pedro si,
“Aneno tata abbinga lalakiya nabbalibal si lima bila a tinapay anna adwaggiya tinapa. Udde ma, makabalin yaw sino odduwera a tolay?”
“Pattutturandawira abbu,” kunni Jesus sino adalanira. Kakaddattan sinay, e antuweno nattutturanino tolayira. Kalimarifuweno kaodduweno lallakiyera, fera pelangino bafabbayira andino aanakira.

Inappa i Jesusino tinapay, nappasalamat ki Dios, kasena nepeyannay sino adalannera sino tolayira a aggatuttud sinay. Kunna kappayino inangwana sino tinapa, e nangngan amminino tolayira kiyad si nassongkalira.
Wasin nabattuwiran ammin, sinapiti Jesus sino adalannera si, “Amamungandawino nabuna ta awana madadak.”
Inamamundeno binuneno tolayira sino lima a tinapay, e karadwa a basketino napannu sino namamaꞌmakka binunara.
Wasin initeno tolayira inoya kakkaꞌbawa inangwa i Jesus, sinapiꞌda si, “Antuwen yawino gumalabbuna aggataronantama umang sito lubag.”
Udde i Jesus, nelasinna si patutanda a mabbali si arira, antuweno inanawannera e inang nagyan sino kulura itata.
Wasin mallammukin, inangngino adalanira i Jesus sino dappiꞌna bebay.
Nattakayira si abang ta maddammangira sey Capernaum. Lammukin, udde amme kepay ginamwangi Jesus.
Kakaꞌmeng kelanga nabbayabbag si natuyag e nappalungino danum.
Wasin nabaya nappaluwera a kinaꞌnareno lima onnu annamma kilometro, initara i Jesus a mallakad sino utunna danuma mararaꞌni sikwara, e nakatalawirangke.
Udde sinapiti Jesus si, “Ammekayu mattalaw se ikkanak.”
E kasera pay maanggamma nappatakay ki Jesus, e kakaꞌmeng kelanga ginamwangira sino umangnganda.
Wasi kagigiꞌbaꞌna, ino kaodduwana tolaya naanawan sey dammang, aggataronanda i Jesus. Se initara si ammena nakitakay sino adalannera, gampade ammura si awana korwana abang sinay a pattakayanna.
Wasinoy, ginamwangino korwanira a abanga naggabwat sey Tiberias a inasip sino gaꞌdang a araꞌni sino pamakkanani Jesus sino tolayira sin nabalininna nappasalamat ki Dios.
Wasin naammuwanino tolayira si awani Jesus andino adalannera, nattakayira sinayira a abang a inang sey Capernaum ta tufukanda i Jesus.
Wasin ginaꞌdangino tolayira sey Capernaum, sinumpalanda i Jesus, e sinapiꞌda sikwana si, “Afu, kanseno ginamwangannu sitaw?”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, tufukandak, bakkanna gafu se naawatandawino kakkaꞌbawa inangwak, nu ammena lud gafu se pinakkantakayu e nabattuggayu.

Bakkan naddino maakkana madarallino aggadandammandaw, nu ammena lurino maakkana mabbalanayun, a antuweno mangaꞌda si biyaya mannayun. Ino mangaꞌda sinaya maakkan sikwayu, ikkanaka Abbingnga Tolay, se ikkanakino nitalakkani Dios a Ama sinaya kalintiyan.”
Wasinoy, nebebutino tolayira sikwana si, “Sanna mantuweno nalawara akwammi takesi tuntulammiyeno panggammani Dios?”
E netabbi Jesus sikwara si, “Ino anggammi Dios a akwandaw, manguruggayu nad sikwaka dinundunna.”
Wasinoy, kunda kappay sikwana si, “Sanna mantuweno kakkaꞌbawa senyala ipaitam sikwami takesi manguruggami sikwam? Wara nad akwannu,
se i Moises, pinakkanneno gagginafutamira si mana sin nagyananda sey kalolowat. Kunna kappayino nepeturakki Dios a kunna si, ‘Pinakkandera si maakkana naggabwat sey langit.’ ”

Sinabbi Jesus si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, bakkanni Moisesino nangaꞌda sino maakkana naggabwat sey langit, nu bakkan luri Ama. E ino nakkanda siꞌin a naggabwat sey langit, bakkan inayino gakkuruwa maakkana iyaꞌda i Dios sikwayu sito ingkein.
Se ino gakkuruwa maakkana iyaꞌda i Dios, antuweno maggabwat sey langita mangaꞌda si biyaya mannayun sino tolayira.”
E sinapiꞌda sikwana si, “Afu, aꞌaꞌdandakami si kunnayana maakkan.”
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Ikkanakino anggamma sapitannino maakkana mangaꞌda si biyag. Se ino umang sikwaka mangurug, ammenana mabisinan anna ammenana mauwaw.
Udde ikkayu, massiki initarakun, ammekayu kepay mangurug. Antu kappayino sinapikku sikwayu siꞌin.
Amminneno netalakki Ama sikwak, manguruwirana sikwak. E amminira a mangurug sikwak, ammekirana ammayan.
Se ammek naddassa naggabwat sey langit takesi akwangkuweno panggammangku, nu ammena lurino panggammanino nanundun sikwak.

E ino panggammani Ama a nanundun sikwak, imutangkungke ino netalaꞌnga sikwak takesi awaningkena malallag sikwara, nu ammekira lud pangngangolin ammin naso uddina aw. Se anggamma si ammina mangammu anna mangurug sikwaka Abbingnga, mabiyayirana si makkikiyad.”

E ino panggammani Ama a nanundun sikwak, imutangkungke ino netalaꞌnga sikwak takesi awaningkena malallag sikwara, nu ammekira lud pangngangolin ammin naso uddina aw. Se anggamma si ammina mangammu anna mangurug sikwaka Abbingnga, mabiyayirana si makkikiyad.”
Wasinoy, adadumulino Judyuwera gafu sino sinapiti Jesus si antuweno maakkana naggabwat sey langit.
E sinapiꞌda si, “Bakkangkad yawi Jesus, a abbingi Jose? Ammutangkeneno inana anna amana. Sannalang kun si naddassa naggabwat sey langit?”
Netabbi Jesus sikwara si, “Ammekayu madadumul.
Awana makaumang sikwaka mangurug, nu amme ipadandammi Ama a nanundun sikwakino panguruwanda, e iraneno pangngangolingku so uddina aw.
Se aneno neturakkino gumalabbunira siꞌina kunna si, ‘Ammina tolay, tulduwanirana i Dios.’
Nu inyereno maningngag sino sapitanni Ama takesi matulduwanira sikwana, ira kappeneno umang sikwak.
Ammena anggamma sapitan si aneno nangita ki Ama, se awana nakaita sikwana nu bakkannappelanga naggabwat sikwana.
Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, ino tolaya mangurug sikwak, mabiyangnga si makkikiyad,
se ikkanakino maakkana mangaꞌda si biyag.
Ino gagginafuyuwera siꞌin, nangnganira si mana sin nagyananda sey kalolowat, udde natayira kappay.
Udde ayawino maakkana naggabwat sey langit, e ino mangngan sitaw, ammenanna a matay.

Ikkanakino maakkana naggabwat sey langita mangaꞌda si biyag, e ino mangngan sitawa maakkan, mabiyag si makkikiyad. Iyawa maakkan, antuweno baggika iyaꞌdak takesi damana a mabiyag ammina tolay si makkikiyad.”
Waso diningngaggino Judyuwera inoy, nassasarombatira a nassapit si, “Ansallang iyaꞌdenaya tolayino baggina ta akkanantam?”
Antuweno sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, nu ammeyu akkanan yo baggika Abbingnga Tolay anna nu ammeyu inuman yo adak, ammekayu mabiyag si makkikiyad.
Se ino mangngan sino baggik anna uminum sino adak, iraneno mabiyag si makkikiyad e pangngangolingkuwerana so uddina aw.
Se ino baggik, antuweno gakkuruwa maakkan, e ino adak, antuweno gakkuruwa mainum.
Ino mangngan sino baggik anna uminum sino adak, mattalaginad sikwak e mattalaginarak pay sikwana.
I Ama a nanundun sikwak, antuweno fungalla biyag, e mabiyayak gafu sikwana. Kunna kappayino mangngan sikwak, mabiyaggappay gafu sikwak.

Ikkanakino kakuruwana maakkana naggabwat sey langit, a bakkanna kakunneno inakkanino gagginafutamira siꞌin. Se ino nangnganira sinay, natayira kappay. Udde ino mangngan sitawa maakkan, mabiyag si makkikiyad.”
Antuwenayino sinapiti Jesus sin nanulduwanna sino sinagoga sey Capernaum.
Wasin diningngaggino nebulunira ki Jesusino sinapiꞌna, oddu sikwara a nassapit si, “Ammenangke masillunino tulduna. Wara manggamma maddingngag si kunnayan?”
Massiki awana nituldu ki Jesus, ammuna a adadumulira, antuweno sinapiꞌna sikwara si, “Ma, kapaꞌlaꞌdaw yaw?
Mannanotinna nanu itandaka Abbingnga Tolaya sumulluwa muli sino naggabwatangku.
Ino mangaꞌda si biyag ino Espirituwi Dios, e awaningke damadamana tolay. Ino sinapikkuwera sikwayu, naggabwatira ammin sino Espirituwi Dios, antu gafuna, mangaꞌdera si biyaya mannayun, nu kuruwandaw.
Udde ana sikwayuweno ammera mangurug sikwak.” Kunnenoyino sinapiti Jesus, se gagangaya ammuneno ammenera mangurug sikwana anna nu inyaneno mangilaku sikwana.
Sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Antu gafuna a sinapikku sikwayu si awaningke makaang sikwaka mangurug, nu amme ipadandammi Ama sikwana.”
Gafu sinaya sinapiꞌna, odduwera a nebulun ki Jesus a nattalekkud, e ammeran nebumbulun sikwana.
Antu gafuna, sinapiti Jesus sino karadwera a adalanna si, “Ikkayu paye, manokayu pay?”
Sinabbi Simon Pedro si, “Afu, waremmangke korwan si dumandanammi? Ikka pelangino manuldu sino mangaꞌda si biyaya mannayun.
Natalanggaggami si ikkeno nadiosana dinunduni Dios sito lubag a matturay.”
E kunni Jesus sikwara si, “Bakkangkadda ikkanakino namili sikwayuwa karadwa? Gampade ana kepayino tata sikwayuwa aripanni Satanas.”
Ino anggamma sapitan, i Judas a abbingi Simon Iscariote, se massiki nu antuweno tata sino karadwera a piniliyi Jesus, antu kappeneno mangilaku sikwana.
Wasin nabalinin inoy, nannodoyubbelangi Jesus sey Galilea. Ammena inang sey Judea, se ammuna a ino pangafuwanirana Judyu sinay, angganda a papatayan.
Udde wasin araꞌniyennino fiyestana Judyu a ngananda si fiyestana Bawiyera,
sinapitino kakkolakira i Jesus a lallaki sikwana si, “Manoka sito Galilea ta itanino adalannuwera sinay yan kakkaꞌbawa akwannu.
Ino tolaya manggamma maddinnamag, ammena magagyan sino bibissangnga lubbun, se ammena kura maammuwanino akwanna. Nu wara akwannu si kakkaꞌbaw, ipaitammad si ammina tolay.”
Kunnenayino sinapiꞌda se massiki ireno kakkolaꞌnga, ammera kappay nangurug sikwana.
Wasinoy, kunni Jesus sikwara si, “Ammena kepay nadaꞌngeno tiyempoka umang sinay. Udde sikwayu, massiki sanna a tiyempo, damayuwa umang.
Ammena dama a kababannaddakayuweno tolayira sito lubag, udde sikwak, kababannaddak se sapitangkuweno kinarakkaꞌneno akwanda.
Umangkayu mantu makifiyesta. Ammek kepay dama a umang se ammena kepay nadaꞌngeno tiyempok.”
Antuwenayino sinapiti Jesus, e natak sey Galilea.
Wasin inanawino kakkolakira i Jesus a inang nakifiyesta sey Jerusalem, sumalatannabbi Jesus a dumandan.
Ino pangafuwanirana Judyu, iniintufuꞌda i Jesus sino fiyestaan. “Sintomat inoy?” kunda.
Ino tolayira a naamung sinay, nadadumulira mappeafu sikwana. Aneno nassapitira si, “Nalawara tolayi Jesus,” udde ino korwanira, sinapiꞌda si, “Bakkan, se balabaliyanneno tolayira.”
Udde adadumulira pelang se mattalawira si dingngaggannino pangafuwandera.
Wasin mattangngennino fiyesta, inangngi Jesus sino Templo e nanuldu sinay.
E nakkaꞌbawino pangafuwanirana Judyu e sinapiꞌda si, “Sintawino nappanna sino kinalaingnga, a ammena kena nadal?”
Wasin diningngaggi Jesusino sinapiꞌda, sinabbangngera si, “Ino itulduk sikwayu, bakkanna naggabwat sikwak, nu ammena lud naggabwat ki Dios a nanundun sikwak.
Ino manggamma mangwa sino panggammani Dios, antuneno mangammu nu naggabwat ki Diosino itulduk onnu sino nakangku pelang.
Se ino manuldu sino naggabwat sino nakammangkepay, tufukanna pelangino kedayawanna. Udde ino manggam si madayawino nanundun sikwana, passiya gakkuruwino sapitanna anna awaningke poposunganna.
Bakkangkaddi Moisesino nangaꞌda sikwayu sino lintig? Udde awaningke sikwayuwa manuntul sinaya lintig. Se nu tuntulandonad, ammeraꞌngad ngangatana papatayan.”
Sinabbino tolayira si, “Nansekkan! Inya maꞌlurino mangngangata mamapatay sikwam?”
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus si, “Namittak ke a nappabattunoy si natakit sino awna aggimwangan, e kapaꞌlaꞌdaw,

massiki ana kappayino akwandaw sinoya aw. Se aneno netuni Moises sikwayuwa inillalupaꞌna sino gagginafunera a kugitandonaddino abbindawira sino mekawaluwa awda. Massiki nu medemmu sino awna aggimwangan, akwandokappay.
Nu antuweno akwandaw sino awna aggimwangan takesi tuntulandawino netuni Moises mappeafu sino kugit, sangkayu lang nabbungut sikwak gafu sino nariyangku sino takiꞌneno lalaki sino awna aggimwangan?
Ammeyu nad balawannino naitayuwa inangwak, nu ammeyu lud dandammannino kinalawanna.”
Waso kunnenoy, ino korwanira a taga-Jerusalem, sinapiꞌda si, “Bakkangkad yawino tolaya anggammino pangafuwantamira a papatayan?
Mayan nurepelanga manuldu sino kaodduwanna tolaya awana makkontara sikwana? Adasi ammura si antuweno Kristo a nekariyi Dios a gumamwang?
Bakkan nakuy, se nanu gumamwangino Kristo, awangkanuwa mangammu sino paggabwatanna, udde iyana tolay, ammutam amminino naggabwatanna.”

Wasinoy, nekokwa i Jesus a naddamit sino nanulduwanna sino Templo, e sinapiꞌna si, “Kundaw si ammurak anna ammuyu kappayino naggabwatangku. Udde ino kakuruwanna, bakkanna naggabwat so nakangkuweno inangngangku sitaw, nu ammena lud aneno nanundun sikwak. Antuweno gakkuruwa naggabwatangku, udde sikwayu, ammeyu inammu.
Udde ikkanak, ammuk, se antuweno naggabwatangku, e antu kappayino nanundun sikwak sitaw.”
Wasin sinapiti Jesus inoy, anggammino pangafuwandera si doꞌmanda, udde ammera dama a akwan, se ammena kepay nadaꞌngeno tiyempona.
Udde massiki nu kunnenoy, odduwera a nangurug sikwana, e sinapiꞌda si, “Antu nakuyino Kristo. Se massiki nu wara korwana gumamwang, awan nakuy oddu si akwanna a kakkaꞌbaw amma sitawa tolay.”
Wasin diningngaggino Fariseowera inaya sapitannino tolayira mappeafu ki Jesus, ira andino pangafuwanirana padi, dinundundeno gwardiyerana Templo a umang manoꞌma ki Jesus.
Gafu sinoy, sinapiti Jesus si, “Ammena mabayino pagyanangku sikwayu, e muliyakun sino nanundun sikwak.
Iintufukandaꞌnga, udde ammeraꞌnga masumpalan, se ammekayuna makaang sino pagyanangku.”

Wasinoy, nakkakibikibebutino pangafuwanirana Judyu a kunda si, “Sintodeno anganna a ammetamma masumpalan? Umang nakuy sino lulubbuna agyananino kasiJudyutamira ta tulduwanna kappayino bakkannira a Judyu a ana sinay.
Kunna si iintufukantamma, udde ammetam masumpalan. Kunna kappay si ammetamma makaang sino pagyananna. Sanna nakuyino anggamma sapitan?” kunda.
Ino kauddiyana awna fiyesta, antuweno kapatiyan. Sinoya aw, nattaꞌdaggi Jesus e nekokwana a nassapit si, “Nu inyeno mauwaw, umang nad sikwak ta uminum
se aneno nepeturakki Dios a kunna si, ‘Massiki inyeno mangurug sikwak, magyanna sikwaneno mangaꞌda si biyaya kunnangke danuma kanayuna mabwal sino bitufut.’ ”

Ino anggamma sapitannino danuma kunni Jesus, antuweno Espirituwi Dios a meyaꞌdana sino manguruwira sikwana. Udde sinoya tiyempo, amme kepay neyaꞌdeno Espiritu, se ammena kepay nuliyi Jesus sey langit ta madayaw.
Wasin diningngaggino tolayireno sinapiti Jesus, sinapitino korwanira si, “Gakkuruwa antuweno gumalabbuna aggataronantam.”
Ino korwanira, sinapiꞌda si, “Antuweno Kristo a dinunduni Dios.” Udde ino pay korwanira, kunda si, “Bakkan, se naggabwat sey Galilea, e bakkan sinayino paggabwatanino Kristo.
Se kunnino nepeturakki Dios si iyaka i Ari David ino Kristo e meyanak sey Betlehem a lubbuni David siꞌin.”
Antu gafuna, ammena nakkakarunneno nakammino tolayira mappeafu ki Jesus.
Ino korwanira, angganda a doꞌman, udde awaningke makaturira manoꞌma sikwana.
Wasinoy, nuliyeno gwardiyerana Templo sino agyananino pangafuwanirana padi andino Fariseowera, e nebebutino nanundunira sikwara si, “Mayan ammeyu dinoꞌman ta neiyandaw sitaw?”
E sinabbino gwardiyera si, “Awaningke kakunnaneno addamiꞌna!”
E sinapitino Fariseowera si, “Ma, massiki ikkayu, nabalabaliyangkayu kappepay?
Wara sikwamiya tatturay anna Fariseo a mangurug sikwana?
Ino odduwera a tolaya nangurug sikwana, awaningke ammura mappeafu sino lintiddam. Kastigunira naddi Dios.”
Agyanino tata sikwara a Fariseo a i Nicodemo a antuweno inang nakitatabbag ki Jesus siꞌin. Sinapiꞌna sikwara si,
“Udde sino lintiddam, ammena dama a paliwatannino tata tolay, nu ammetambu imbistigaran ta ammuntamino inangwana.”
E netabbino bulunnera sikwana si, “Ma, taga-Galileaka kappay ta duffunannu? Adalannu kappenaddino nepeturakki Dios takesi maammuwannu si awaningke a gumalabbuna maggabwat sey Galilea.”
Wasinoy, inanawiran sey balera.
Udde i Jesus, inang sey kulura Olivo.
Waso kadaramaꞌna, naggiꞌbatti Jesus a nuli sino Templo, e inaribumbungan amminino tolayira sinay. Nattutturi Jesus, kasena nanuldu sikwara.
Wasinoy, ginamwangino korwanira a mammesturuwerana lintig andino Fariseowera a niyang sino tata a bafaya dinoꞌmanda a nakidurug si bakkanna atawana. Nepataꞌdadda sino naraꞌlanganino tolayira.
E sinapiꞌda ki Jesus si, “Afu, iyawa bafay, dinaꞌngamiya nakidurug si bakkanna atawana.
Kunnino lintiyi Moises si malapalappaꞌngaddino kunnayana bafay kiyad si matay. Udde sikwam, sanneno masapiꞌnu?”
Kunnenoyino sinapiꞌda ki Jesus se angganda si wara paggafuwanda a midarum sikwana. Udde i Jesus, aggaoꞌmabbelanga panuraꞌngeno tamuruna sino lafuk.
Wasin patotonutandeno nappakibebut sikwana nu sanneno masapiꞌna, ginabwat e sinapiꞌna sikwara si, “Nu inya sikwayuweno awana liwaꞌna, antu naddino maunta a mallappag sikwana.”
Kasena kappay inoꞌmadda manurak sino lafuk.
Wasin diningngaddenaya sinapiti Jesus, nassittatera a inanaw a naunteno kalakayanda kiyad si inanawira ammin. Da Jesus pelangino natak annino bafaya aggataꞌdaggepay sino aꞌlangnga.
Ginabwati Jesus e sinapiꞌna sino bafay si, “Antomatiran? Awana natak si mangastigu sikwam?”
“Awan, Afu,” kunnino bafay.
E nekunni Jesus sikwana si, “Massiki ikkanak, ammetaka pay kastigun. Manokan lud, udde ammemun ipidwa a malliwat.”

Wasin nanuldu kappayi Jesus sino tolayira, sinapiꞌna si, “Ikkanakino kunnangke sirwata mawwaldag sino nakammino tolayira sito lubag. Nu inyeno dumandan sikwak, ammena mallakad so lammuk se mawaldan sitawa sirwata mangaꞌda si biyaya mannayun.”
E sinapitino Fariseowera sikwana si, “Ammena makurug yana sapitannu se taꞌdaggannungkepayino baggim.”

E netabbi Jesus si, “Massiki nu ikkanakungkepayino manaꞌdag sino baggik, gakkurubbayino sapitangku, se ammukino naggabwatangku annino iraꞌbungku. Udde sikwayu, ammeyu inammuweno naggabwatangku annino iraꞌbungku.
Ino akwandawa mangukum sikwak, nabbakabakkan se dandammandopelangino maitayu. Udde sikwak, awana ukumangku.
Udde nu wara ukumangku, fustuweno angngukungku, se bakkannappelangino mangukum, nu ammena lud ikkami anni Ama a nanundun sikwak.
Se neturak sino lintiddaw a kakuruwanino sapitannino adwera a tolay nu makkunneno ammakurudda.
Ino tata a manaꞌdag sikwak, ikkanakungkepay, e ino mekadwa, i Ama a nanundun sikwak.”
Wasinoy, binebuꞌda si, “Sintawino agyanani Amama kunnu?”
E kunni Jesus si, “Ammerak gakkuruwa ammu anna ammeyu kappay ammuwi Ama. Se nannud ammurak, ammuyu naggappayi Amak.”
Sinapiti Jesus amminira yaw sin nanulduwanna sino Templo a araꞌni sino aggiittunganda si pirak. Udde massiki aneno pangafuwanira sinay, awana manoꞌma sikwana, se ammena kepay nadaꞌngeno tiyempona.
Wasinoy, sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Anawantakayuna, e pakaiintufukandaꞌnga. Udde ammekayuna makaang sino agyanangku, se matekayuna a ammena napakomanino liwaꞌdaw.”
Antu gafuna, nattatarabbanino pangafuwanirana Judyu si, “Ansannada sinapit si ammetam makaang sino agyananna? Papatayannaneno baggina e?”
Sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Ikkayu, naggabwakkayu sito lubag, e ino pelang mappeafu sito lubaggino ammuyu. Udde ikkanak, naggabwatak sey langit, antuweno tangananino nakangku sikwayu.
Antu gafuna, sinapikku si matekayuwa ammena napakomanino liwaꞌdaw, se antuneno gakkuruwa makwa nu ammeyu kuruwan si ikkanakino sinapikku.”
“Ma, inyaka maꞌlud?” kunda sikwana.
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Ino sinapasapikku sikwayu nangiyafu siꞌin kiyad sito ingkein.
Oddu kappenaddino sapitangkuwa mappaliwat sikwayu. Udde ino pelang ipakaammuk sino tolayira sito lubag ino diningngaggu sino nanundun sikwak, a gakkurug amminino sapitannera.”
Udde ammera naawatan si i Dios a Amana ino sinapiti Jesus.

Antu gafuna, sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Nanu itayaddaka Abbingnga Tolay sino krus, kaseyuna maammuwan si ikkanakino sinapikku. Maammuwandona kappay si awana akwangku si maggabwat sino nakangku, nu ammek lud sapitampelangino netulduwi Ama.
Ino nanundun sikwak, kanayuna mebumbulun sikwak. Ammenak pittatan, se ino kanayuna akwangku ino panggammanna.”
Odduwera a nangurug sikwana sin diningngaddenaya sinapiꞌna.
Wasinoy, sinapiti Jesus sino Judyuwera a nangurug sikwana si, “Nu mattalaginaggayuwa manuntul sino netulduk sikwayu, gakkuruwa ikkayuweno adalangku.
Maammuwandawino kakuruwan mappeafu sikwak, e inaya kakuruwan, antuweno mappawaya sikwayu sino kinaaripandaw.”
Wasinoy, sinabbino Judyuwera si, “Gakagakarakami i Abraham, e awangkepay nangaripan sikwami. Sannu lang sapitan si mapawayangkami?”
Sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, massiki sanna a tolaya malliwat, ino liwatino nangaripan sikwana.
Ino aripan, damana a paanawan sino balayino nangaripan sikwana, udde ino abbingino makwan balay, ammena paanawan, se abbingnga si makkikiyad.
Antu gafuna, nu ikkanaka Abbingi Diosino mangipawaya sikwayu sino kinaaripandaw, gakkuruwingke a mawayangkayu.
Ammuk si gakagakarakayuwi Abraham, udde massiki kunnenoy, anggandak kepaya papatayan, se ammayandawino sapitangku.
Ino pelang nepaita i Ama sikwak ino sapitangku. Kunna kappayino akwandaw, se ino tuntulandaw ino diningngaddaw sino amayu.”
Sinapitino Judyuwera si, “Awana korwan si naggaka sikwami, nu bakkampelangi Abraham.”
Udde netabbi Jesus si, “Nu gakkurungngadda gakagakarakayuwi Abraham, tuntulandonaddino inangangwana.
Se itandaw, anggandaka papatayan, nu sapitangku pelang sikwayuweno kakuruwana diningngaggu ki Dios. Bakkanna kunnenoyino inangwa i Abraham.
Inayira a akwandaw, kakunneno aggangweno gakkuruwa amayu.”
E sinapiꞌda si, “Bakkangkamiya banayi, se tata ke ino amamiya i Dios.”

Sinapikkappayi Jesus sikwara si, “Nannud gakkuruwa i Diosino amayu, anggandaꞌngaggappay se antuweno naggabwatangku sin inangngangku sitaw. Bakkanna urekungkepayino inangngangku sitaw, nu ammena lud antuweno nanundun sikwak.
Mayan ammeyu maawatanino sapitangku? On se ammeyu anggamma dingngaggan.

Kakunnayuweno amayuwa i Ofag. Ino anggamma, antuweno anggandawa akwan. Gumapapatay nangiyafu siꞌin kiyad sito ingkein. Kababannangngeno kakuruwan se passiya siriyeno ana sikwana. Nu massisiri, tuntulanna pelangino gagangena, se sariyon anna antuweno fungalla ammina siri.
Udde ikkanak, passiya gakkuruwino sapitangku sikwayu, e antuweno gafuna a ammerak kuruwan.
Inya sikwayuweno mangitaꞌdag si wara liwakku? Awan. Nu gakkurug ammina sapitangku, mayan ammerak kuruwan?
Ino abbingira i Dios, dingngaggandeno sapitanna sikwara. Ino gafuna a ammeyu dingngaggannino sapitanna sikwayu, bakkangkayuwa abbingnga.”
Wasinoy, sinapitino pangafuwanirana Judyu ki Jesus si, “Gakkuruwingke ino sinapiꞌmiya taga-Samariaka a kalingami,
anna naassaddangka kappay.”
“Ammek naassaddan,” netabbi Jesus, “se dayawangkuwi Ama. Udde ikkayu, ayoyungandak.
Ammek mappedayaw, udde aneno makammu sino kedayawangku, e antu kappeneno manaꞌdag sikwak anna mangukum sikwayu.
Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, nu inyeno mangurug sito itulduk, ammenana matay si makkikiyad.”

Wasinoy, sinapikkappayino Judyuwera si, “Awaninna daladudwami si gakkuruwa inassaggan. Massikira Abraham andino gumalabbunira siꞌin, natayira ammin, gampade sapitannu kepay si nu inyeno mangurug sino tuldum, ammeran matay.
Nadayoka kad amma sino gagginafutamira a da Abraham andino gumalabbunira, a natayiran? Inyakangkekun?”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Nu ikkanaꞌngaddino mipadayaw sino baggikungkepay, awana serbina. Udde i Ama a kundaw si Diosdaw, antuweno midayaw sikwak.
Ammeyu inammu, udde ikkanak, ammukungke. Nu kungku nad si ammek inammu, massisiriyaꞌngad a kunna pay sikwayu. Udde gakkuruwa ammuk, e akwangkuweno sapitanna.
Maanggammingke i Abraham a gagginafuyu siꞌin sin naammuwanna si maitananeno gamwangangku sito lubag, e gakkuruwa naitanan e maanggammingke.”
Sinapitino Judyuwera si, “Awangkepay limafuluneno runnu, e ansannuweno nita ki Abraham?”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, sin amme kepay neyanaki Abraham, nagyanakun.”
Antuweno naꞌnamira si batu e lappagganda naddi Jesus, udde inalluweti Jesus
a inanaw sino Templo.
Wasin malallakari Jesus, initaneno tata a lalakiya neyanaka lappat.
E nappakibebutino adalannera si, “Afu, inyeno makwan liwat sino nalappattannenaya lalaki?”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Bakkanna liwaꞌneno nalappattanna, anna bakkangkappaya liwatino mapparanaꞌngera, nu ammena lud nalappat takesi maiteno pannakadama i Dios a mappabattunoy sikwana.
Akwantammaddino nepakweno nanundun sikwak se kunnangke aw kepay, a ino anggamma sapitan, aggabiyayetangkepay. Se nanu matayetam, awaninna damatama akwan a kunnangke gafiya ammetam makatarabafu.
Udde kawarak kepay sito lubag, kakunnakino sirwata mawwaldag sino nakamma tolay.”
Wasin sinapiti Jesus inoy, nalluppa sino lubag, e nepalluyaꞌnga, kasena neaffuriyat sino mateno lappat,
e sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Umangka mimutung sino nabissokunga addiyutan sey Siloe.” (Ino anggamma sapitannino Siloe, Dinundun.) Inang nimutungino lalaki, e sino nuliyanna sino balena, nakaiten.
Wasin initeno kalubbunannera andino nitera sikwana sin nappalimutanna siꞌin, sinapiꞌda si, “Bakkangkad yanino kanayuna aggatuttura mappalimut?”
Nekunnino korwanira si, “On, antu,” udde kumpayino korwanira si, “Bakkan, udde nakkamutungira pelang.”
Wasinoy, sinapitino lalaki si, “On, ikkanakin nappalimut siꞌin.”
E nebebuꞌda si, “Ansangka lang mantu makaita?”

E sinabbangnga si, “Agyanino tolaya mingngan si Jesus, nepalluyaꞌngeno luppana sino lubag, kasena neaffuriyat sino matak, e sinapiꞌna si, ‘Umangka mimutung sey Siloe.’ Inangngak sinay, e wasin nimutungak, nakaitakumpay.”
E sinapiꞌda sikwana si, “Sintawino agyananna?”
“Inta, ammek ammu,” kunnino lalaki.
Waso kunnenoy, neyandeno lalakiya nabbattunoyino lappaꞌna sino Fariseowera.
Awna aggimwanganino nangwani Jesus si luyak a nepagasna sino lappattino lalaki.
E nebebutino Fariseowera sino lalaki nu sanneno nakwa sikwana a naariyeno lappaꞌna. E nepidwana a sinapit si, “Inafuriyatanneno matak si luyak, e wasin nimutungak, nakaitakumpay.”

Antu gafuna, sinapitino korwanira a Fariseo si, “Amme dinunduni Diosino tolaya nangwa si kunnayan, se ammena tuntulannino lintig mappeafu sino awna aggimwangan.” Udde ino korwanira, sinapiꞌda si, “Makaangwa kaddino minalliwat si kakkaꞌbawa kunnayan?” E naggaradweran.
Gafu so kunnenoy, finuꞌngaddangkappayino Fariseowera sino lalaki si, “Nu sikwam, sanneno masapiꞌnu mappeafu sikwana, se kunnu si nepabbattunoydaka?”
E sinabbangnga si, “Tata lura gumalabbun.”
Udde amme kinuruwino pangafuwanirana Judyu si lappat siꞌin udde nabbattunoyin, antu gafuneno nappaayanda sino mapparanaꞌngera,
e nebebuꞌda si, “Abbindokad yaw? Gakkurug kadda lappat sin neyanakanna? Sanna mat ta makaita mantu?”
E sinabbino mapparanaꞌngera si, “On, abbimmi pay yan, e gakkuruwa lappat sin neyanakanna.
Udde ammemi ammuweno gafuna a makaiten sito ingkein, anna ammemi kappay ammu nu inyeno nappabattunoy sikwana. Futandawingkepay sikwana se dokallingkena e ammunanino itabbangngera.”
Antuwenoyino sinapiꞌda se mattalawira sino pangafuwanirana Judyu. Se natatarabbanda si nu wara massapit si i Jesusino Kristo a nekariyi Dios, ammeran mebilanga Judyu.
Antu gafuna a sinapitino mapparanaꞌngera si antuwengkepayino paffutanda.
Wasinoy, inayangkappayino pangafuwanirana Judyuweno lalakiya lappat siꞌin, e sinapiꞌda si, “Massapataka ki Dios si gakkuruwino sapitannu, se ino nappabattunoy sikwam, ammumi si minalliwat.”
E sinabbino lalaki si, “Ammek ammu nu minalliwat onnu bakkan. Ino pelang ammuk, lappattak siꞌin, udde sitoya, makaitakun.”
E binebuꞌda kappay sikwana si, “Sanneno inangwana sikwam a makaitakan?”
E sinapiꞌna kappay si, “Sinapikku kenain sikwayu, udde ammeyu kuruwan. Ma, anggandokaggappaya dingngaggan? Anggandokaggappaya mabbali si adalanna?”
Wasinoy, nassapasapitanda si, “Ikka keneno adalanna, udde sikwami, adalandakamiyi Moises.
Se ammumi si sinatabbi Diosi Moises, udde iyana tolay, ammemi inammuweno naggabwatanna.”
Sinapitino lalaki si, “Makkaꞌbawak sitan. Nepabbattunoydak, gampade ammeyummangke inammuweno naggabwatanna.
Ammutangkena si amme dingngagganni Diosino minalliwatira, udde dingngagganneno maddayawira sikwana annino mangwera sino panggammanna.
Makkiyad sin gafuna yo lubag, awana nadingngag si tolaya mappabattunoy si neyanaka lappat.
Nu ammena nad naggabwat ki Dios, ammena nad makaangwa si kunnayaw.”
E sinapitino pangafuwanira sikwana si, “Neyanakka a minalliwat, e sandakami lang tulduwan?” Wasin sinapiꞌdenoy, nepaanoran.
Wasin diningngaggi Jesus a nepaanoreno lappatta nepabbattunoyna, inintaraꞌnga, e wasin sinumpalanna, sinapiꞌna sikwana si, “Mangurugga sino Abbingnga Tolay?”
E sinabbino lalaki si, “Afu, ituldum nu inya takesi manguruwak sikwana.”
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Naitamun se antuweno makitatabbag sikwam ingkein.”
“Afu, manguruwak sikwam,” kunnino lalaki, e namalitura naddayaw sikwana.

Wasinoy, sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Inangngak sito lubag ta melasinino ammera nangammu ki Dios andino nangammuwera sikwana. Ino ammera nangammu ki Dios a meyampariyira si lappat, pabbattunoyangkuwera ta makaitera. Udde ino makkun si ammura i Dios, kunnangke malappattirana.”
Ino Fariseowera a agyan sinay, diningngaddeno sinapiꞌna, e sinapiꞌda sikwana si, “Ma, anggammu kadda sapitan si lappakkami kappay?”
E sinabbi Jesus si, “Nannud gakkuruwa lappakkayu, awan nadda liwaꞌdaw. Udde gafu se kundaw si makaitakayu, antu gafuna a ana kepayino liwaꞌdaw.”

Wasinoy, niyampariyi Jesus a nassapit si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu. Nu wara kulunganino karnero e amme sumallungino tolay sino fustuwa lamwanganna, nu ammena lud munek sino alasangnga, gumatakaw anna tulisan inaya tolay.
Se ino gumaimut sino karnerowera, sumallung sino fustuwa lamwangan.
Antuweno patallungannino gwardiya neno lamwangan, e ayanneno karneronera. E nu taiingnganannera, maimunuwandeno damiꞌna, e umaddanira sikwana, kasenera pallawanan.
Nu nelawannera ammin, ifuyuꞌnera e dumandanira sikwana, se ammureno damiꞌna.
Ammerangkelang kedadandanan si korwana tolay, nu ammera lud mabbukal, se ammera inammuweno damiꞌna.”
Antuweno ampariyi Jesus sino tolayira, udde ammera naawatan nu sanneno anggamma sapitan.
Wasinoy, niyampariggappayi Jesus a nassapit si, “Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, ikkanakino kunnangke lamwangana sumallunganino karnerowera.
Amminira a naunta sikwaka nanuldu si bakkanna gakkurug, kunnangke gumatakawira anna tulisan. Udde ammayira kinuruwino karnerok.
Ikkanakino kunnangke lamwangan. Massiki inyeno sumallung sikwak, mesalakanira. Ireno kunnangke karneroka sumallung anna mallawan a kanayuna nalawarino garafanda.
Ino gakkanneno gumatakaw, awana korwan nu bakkampelangino mattakaw, mamapatay, anna manaral. Udde ikkanak, inangngak sitaw takesi maaꞌdan naddino tolayira si nalawara biyaya awana kakunnana.
“Ikkanakino kalalawarana gumaimut si karnero. Ino nalawara gumaimut, iyaꞌdaneno biyangnga takesi mesalakanira.

Udde nu ino mindag sino karnerowera ino matandanampelang a bakkannino makwan karnero, e nu wara itanna si sumarona atu, mabbukal e anawanneno indagganna a karnero. E katannino sumarona atuweno korwanira a karnero, e mawarawarakino korwanira.
Ino gafuneno nabbukalanino matandanan, bakkanna akwaneno karnerowera e ammenera ikalow.

Udde ikkanakino kalalawarana gumaimut si karnero. Se ino nangammuwangku sino karnerokira annino nangammuwanda sikwak, kakunnana kappayino nangammuwangku ki Ama annino nangammuwanna sikwak. E iyaꞌdak kappayino biyaggu takesi mabiyayira.

Udde ikkanakino kalalawarana gumaimut si karnero. Se ino nangammuwangku sino karnerokira annino nangammuwanda sikwak, kakunnana kappayino nangammuwangku ki Ama annino nangammuwanna sikwak. E iyaꞌdak kappayino biyaggu takesi mabiyayira.
Ana kappayino korwanira a karnerok a ammena kepay nedagga sito kulungan.
Iyangkuwera nad sitaw ta dingngagganda kappayino damikku, takesi mittateno kaaramunganda ammin e tata ke ino mimut sikwara.
“Iiddukannaki Ama se iyaꞌdakino biyaggu takesi mangngangoliyak kappena.
Awaningke a makapapatay sikwak nu bakkanna urekungkepay, se aneno kalintiyangkuwa mangaꞌda sino biyaggu e ana kappayino kalintiyangkuwa mappauli, se antuweno netuni Ama sikwak.”
Wasinoy, naggadwa kappayino Judyuwera gafu sinayira a sinapiti Jesus.
Odduwera a nassapit si, “Inanset se naassaddan. Sanna maꞌlura dingngaggandaw sitan sapitanna ya?”
Udde ino korwanira, sinapiꞌda si, “Ino naassaddan, ammera makasapit si kunnenoy. Damana kadda mappabattunoy si lappattino dimonyu?”
Wasin tiyempona irid, agyanin fiyesta sey Jerusalem a ngananda si fiestana Kewaꞌlatanino Templo.
Agyani Jesus sinoya fiyesta a malallakad sino Palayari Solomon sino Templo.
Inaribumbunganino Judyuwera, e sinapiꞌda si, “Naansa maꞌneno pitulduwannu sino kakuruwan? Ituldumun nad sikwami nu ikkeno Kristo a nekariyi Dios.”
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Netulduk kena sikwayu, udde ammeyu kinurug. Ino kakkaꞌbawa inangwak gafu sino pannakadama i Ama, ireno mitaꞌdag sikwak.
Udde ammekayu mangurug se bakkangkayuwa karnerok.
Se ino karnerokira, dingngaggandeno damikku e ammukira kappay. Antu gafuna, dumandanira sikwak,
e aꞌdangkuwera si biyaya mannayun. Ammerangke mekatway ki Dios si makkikiyad, e awangkappaya makafulat sikwara sikwak.
Se i Ama a nitalak sikwara sikwakino kapatiyan si ammin,
e awaningke makafulat sikwara sino aggimuti Ama.
Se ikkami anni Ama, mittatakami.”
Wasin sinapiti Jesus inoy, naꞌnangkappayino Judyuwera si batuwa ilappadda nad sikwana.
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Odduweno nalawara inangwak sikwayuwa nepaangwa i Ama sikwak. Sanna sikwareno gafuna a lappaggandak?”
E sinabbino Judyuwera si, “Bakkannino nalawara inangwamino pallappaggammi sikwam, nu ammena lurino pangababilannu ki Dios. Toleka pelang, udde ikunnamino baggim sikwana.”
Sinapiti Jesus si, “Udde aneno nepeturakki Dios sino kundawa lintiddaw mappeafu sino pangafuwandawira siꞌina kunna si, ‘Ikkanaki Dios, e sapitangku si dioskayu kappay.’
Ammutam si ammenan maangkakweno nepeturakki Dios. Nu diosino nepingnganna sino tolayira a nappasapitanna sino sapiꞌna,
sandolang sapitan si ababilangkuwi Dios gafu se sinapikku si ikkanakino Abbingnga? Se ikkanakino pinilina anna dinundunna sito lubag.
Nu ammeꞌngad akwanino kakkaꞌbawa paangwa i Ama sikwak, massiki nu ammekayu mangurug sikwak.
Udde nu antuweno akwangku, massiki ammeyu kuruwannino sapitangku, kuruwandonad yawa akwangkuwera, takesi maammuwandawa ana i Ama sikwak anna anappay sikwana.”
Wasinoy, kinakkapanda kappaya doꞌmani Jesus, udde nalliꞌwa sikwara.
Nuliyi Jesus sino dammangngeno wawwanga Jordan, inang sino pitta a nabbawtisarani Juan sino tolayira, e nagyan sinay.
Odduwa tolaya inang sikwana. Sinapiꞌda si, “Awana inangwa i Juan si kakkaꞌbaw, udde gakkurug ammina sinapiꞌna mappeafu sitawa tolay.”
E odduwereno nangurug sikwana sinay.

Agyanino makkakarolakira a nagyan sey Betania a da Maria, Marta, anni Lazaro. Iyawa Maria, antuweno nisibug si bambangug sino takkiyi Afu Jesus, kasena finunatan sino abuꞌnga. Wasinoy, nalowani Lazaro,

Agyanino makkakarolakira a nagyan sey Betania a da Maria, Marta, anni Lazaro. Iyawa Maria, antuweno nisibug si bambangug sino takkiyi Afu Jesus, kasena finunatan sino abuꞌnga. Wasinoy, nalowani Lazaro,
e nanundunda Maria anni Marta si umang mangipakaammu ki Jesus, e sinapiꞌna si, “Afu, malowanino iiddukannuwa bulunnu.”
Wasin diningngaggi Jesus inoy, sinapiꞌna si, “Inaya kalona, bakkanna katayanino pattupakkanna, nu ammena lud nakwa inay takesi madayawi Dios anna madayawak kappaya Abbingnga.”
I Jesus, iiddukannangke ino talluwera a makkakarolak.
Udde massiki diningngangnga a malowani Lazaro, ammena nalana inang se nagyangkepay sinay si adwa aw,
kasena nekun sino adalannera si, “Muliyetamun sey Judea.”
“Afu, ammena kepay nabayino pallappaggan naddino Judyuwera sinay sikwam, gampade anggammu kepaya muliyetam sinay?” kunda.
Udde sinapiti Jesus si, “Kadde, awana makwa sikwatam. Karadwa orattino tata si aw, e ammena meduffuweno tolaya mallakad si aw, se maiteno lakaranna.
Udde ino mallakad si gafi, meduffu, se awana sirwaꞌna.”
E sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Maturuwinni Lazaro a buluntam, udde angku gammiyan.”
E sinapitino adalannera si, “Afu, nalawad nu maturug, se maariyeno kalona.”
Aridda si gakkuruwa naturuwi Lazaro, udde ino anggammi Jesus a sapitan, natayin.
Antu gafuna, sinapiꞌnan sikwara si, “Natayinni Lazaro,
udde nalawad se awanak sinay sin natayanna, takesi mattuyangngeno angnguruddaw gafu sino itandaw. Ara, intamun ta antam itan.”
I Tomas a ngananda si Siping, sinapiꞌna sino bafulunnera a adalan si, “Mebulunetam sikwana, takesi nu papatayanda, matayetam pay ammin.”
Wasin ginamwanda Jesus sey Betania, naammuwanda si kappata awinni Lazaro a netanam.
Gafu se tallu ke a kilometroweno kaaroyuna Betania sey Jerusalem,
odduwera a taga-Jerusalem a inang namambay sikwara Marta anni Maria gafu sino natayanino kolaꞌda.
Wasin diningngaggi Marta a araꞌniyenda Jesus a gumamwang, inangngira dinambal. Udde i Maria, natak sino balera.
Sinapiti Marta ki Jesus si, “Afu, nu nagyangka nad sitaw, ammena nad natayino kolaꞌmi.
Udde massiki kunnenoy, ammuk si iyaꞌdana i Dios sikwamino ingkelamanga arangngannu.”
E sinapiti Jesus si, “Mangngangolineno kolaꞌngu.”
“On, ammuk si mangngangolina so uddina awa meyindan sino pangngangoliyanino amminira a natay,” netabbi Marta.
E sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Ikkanakino mappaangngangoli si natay anna ikkanakino mangaꞌda si biyag. Ammina mangurug sikwak, massiki nu matayira, mabiyayira kappay si makkikiyad.
E amminira a aggabiyag, nu manguruwira sikwak, ammera matay si makkikiyad. Kuruwannu yaw?”
“On, Afu,” kunni Marta, “kuruwangku si ikkeno Kristo a Abbingi Dios a nekarina a umang sito lubag.”
Wasin sinapiti Marta inay, nuli sino balera, kinulafattanna i Maria, kasena nedumidumiya, “Ginamwangino Afutam e paayaddaka.”
Wasin diningngaggi Maria inay, ginabwat e nakkangkama inang dinambal ki Jesus,
se ana kepera Jesus sino patabboka nanambalani Marta sikwana.
Ino tolayira a nagyan sino balaya namambay ki Maria, initareno ginabwatanna, e dinandananda, se aridda si umang sino tanam ta mattangit sinay.
Wasin ginamwangi Maria sino agyananda Jesus, namalitud sino aꞌlangnga, e sinapiꞌna si, “Afu, nu nagyangka nad sitaw, ammena nad natayino kolaꞌmi.”
Wasin inita i Jesus si mattatarangiꞌda Maria andino bafulunnera, malowingke ino nakamma,
e sinapiꞌna si, “Sintawino nitanammandaw sikwana?”
E sinapiꞌda si, “Afu, antam itan.”
E nattangippayi Jesus.
E sinapitino tolayira si, “Itandaw, dokallingke ino angngikalona ki Lazaro.”
Udde sinapitino korwanira si, “Nepabbattunoyneno lappatta tolay. Mayan awaningke inangwana takesi ammena nad natayi Lazaro?”
Wasin ginamwangira sino tanam, nallalow kappayino nakamma. Agwefino nitanammanda a nagakutan si batu.
“Ariyandaw yan batu,” kunni Jesus.
“On, Afu, udde nabuyukin, se kappata awinna netanam,” kunni Marta a kolakino natay.
E sinapiti Jesus sikwana si, “Ammek kad sinapit sikwam, a nu mangurugga, maitammeno kedayawani Dios?”
Wasinoy, inarireno batu. Sinangawi Jesus, kasena nekun si, “Ama, mappasalamatak se dingngaggandak.
Ammuk si aggadingngaggandak, udde sapitangku yaw gafu sino tolayira sitaw, takesi kuruwanda si ikkeno nanundun sikwak.”
Wasin sinapiꞌnenoy, nekulawuna a nassapit si, “Lazaro, mallawangkan.”
E nallawanino nataya naburiburan si sinnunino kamaꞌna andino takkina, e nababbaddangkappayino uluna. E sinapiti Jesus sino tolayira si, “Ubbarandaw takesi makaanawin.”
Ino Judyuwera a inang namambay sikwara Maria, initara inaya inangwa i Jesus. Antu gafuna, oddu sikwareno nangurug sikwana.
Udde ino korwanira, inangngira sino Fariseowera e netuldureno inangwa i Jesus.

Waso kunnenoy, ino Fariseowera andino pangafuwanirana padi, nepaayaddeno korwanira a pangafuwanirana Judyu, e nattatarabbira. Sinapiꞌda si, “Sanna matino akwantam? Se inaya tolay, odduweno kakkaꞌbawa akwanna.

Nu purayantam pelang, mangurungnga ammina tolay sikwana, e antuneno pabbalinda si afura. Dingngaggannino taga-Romera a matturay sikwatam, umangngirana sitaw, e darallandeno Templotam anna ammina patturayantam.”
Udde naddamiti Caifas, a afafuna padi sinoya run, e sinapiꞌna si, “Awaningke ammuyu.
Ammeyu kad ammu si unoyneno tata ke ino matay ta mabiyayino kalubbunannera amma sino matayetam ammin?”
Inaya sinapiti Caifas, bakkanna naggabwat sino nakammangkepay, udde gafu se antuweno afafuna padi, nepelabbuni Dios sikwana si matena i Jesus takesi mabiyayino kalubbunanna a Judyu.
E bakkampelangino kalubbunanna a Judyu, nu ammena lud ammina abbingi Dios a magyan si palulubbun, takesi mittatera ammin.
Nangiyafu sinoya aw, natatarabbanino pangafuwanirana Judyu nu ansanda a mamapatay ki Jesus.
Antu gafuna, amme nappaddara Jesus sey Judea, nu ammera lud inang sey Efraim, tata a lubbuna araꞌni sino danak. Antuweno nagyananda Jesus andino adalannera.
Araꞌniyennino fiyestana Judyuwera a ngananda si Laꞌwutan. Odduwera a inang sey Jerusalem a naggabwat si palulubbun, takesi akwandeno gagangera a mappadalus sino baggira so liyena fiyesta.
Pakaiintufukanda i Jesus, e wasin naaramamungira sino Templo, nakkakibikibebutira si, “Sanneno madandandaw? Ammenada gumamwang sito fiyesta ya?”
Se ino pangafuwanirana padi andino Fariseowera, sinapiꞌda si nu wara makaammu sino agyanani Jesus, itulduna nad sikwara takesi ipadoꞌmara.
Wasin annamma aw kepay aseneno fiyestana Laꞌwutan, inang kappera Jesus sey Betania a lubbuni Lazaro a nepangngangolina.
E nidadanira si pamuwafanda Jesus, e i Marteno mallaꞌgak. I Lazaroweno tata a makikkan sikwara Jesus.
Wasinoy, nangappa i Maria si kagadwana litrowa nangina a bambanguwa passiya nardo. E nesibungnga sino takkiyi Jesus, kasena finunatan sino abuꞌnga, e medadarngiyopino bangungnga sino balay.
Udde i Judas Iscariote a adalani Jesus a antuneno milaku sikwana, sinapiꞌna si,
“Sanna mat ta ammena ilaku inaya bambangug ta wara meyaꞌda sino mekakallakkira? Se ino balorna, mekunna sino sweldu si tarun.”
Ino nassapitani Judas sinoy, bakkanna gafu se ikaloneno mekakallakkira, nu bakkan lud gafu se asoꞌdino kamaꞌna. Se antuweno miggam sino piraꞌda, e gastunna nu anggamma se antuweno gagangena.
Udde sinapiti Jesus ki Judas si, “Purayannu pelangi Maria. Se neyimfunnenaya bambangug takesi antuweno naunta a nelana sino baggik para sino ketanammangku.
Se ino mekakallakkira, kanayunira a ana sikwayu, udde ikkanak, ammek kanayuna ana sikwayu.”
Waso kunnenoy, odduweno Judyu a naningngag si ana i Jesus sey Betania, antuweno inangngira sinay. Udde bakkampelangi Jesusino anda itan, nu ammera luggappay umang itani Lazaro a nepangngangolina.
Kunnantu, ino pangafuwanirana padi, nattatarabbandeno akwanda a mamapatekappay ki Lazaro,
se gafu sikwana, odduweno Judyuwera a nekatway sikwara e nanguruwira ki Jesus.
Wasi kadaramaꞌna, diningngaggino odduwera a tolaya inang nakifiyesta si gumamwanginni Jesus sey Jerusalem.
E nappera si adonna ayog
ta umangngira dumambal sikwana, e nekulawura si, “Madandayawi Dios! Madandayokappenaddino dinunduni Afu Dios si pannakabaggina! Madandayawino Aritam sito Israel.”
I Jesus, nattakay si ubbunna asnowa nepaappana. Antuweno neyakkuruwanino nepeturakki Dios siꞌina kunna si,
“Ikkayuwa talubbuna Jerusalem, ammekayu mattalaw se gumamwanginnino Ariyuwa mattakay si ubbunna asno.”

Ino adalanira i Jesus, ammera kepay naawatan si iyawa makweno meyakkuruwanino neturak. Udde wasin nuliyi Jesus sey langit, antuweno nanandammanda sitawa neturak mappeafu sikwana e gakkuruwa nakwa sikwana.
Ino tolayira a nita sino nappaangngangoliyani Jesus ki Lazaro sin inayanna e nallawan, netulutuluyda a nipakaammu sino nakwa.
Antu gafuna, odduweno inang dinambal ki Jesus, se diningngaddenaya kakkaꞌbawa senyal a inangwana.
Antuweno nattatarabbanino Fariseowera si, “Itandaw kadda, awana serbineno inangwatam. Se ammina tolay, dumandanira sikwana.”
Agyanino bakkannira a Judyu a naggabwat sey Grecia a inang nakifiyesta sey Jerusalem ta dayawanda i Dios.
Inangngira ki Felipe a taga-Betsaida a sakoꞌma Galilea, e sinapiꞌda si, “Afu, anggammi nad tatabbanni Jesus.”
Inangngi Felipe ki Andres ta itulduneno sinapiꞌda, kasera nabbuluna inang nituldu ki Jesus.
E sinapiti Jesus sikwara si, “Nadaꞌngennino tiyempowa ikkanaka Abbingnga Tolay, medayawak sino katayangku.
Gakkurug yo sapitangku sikwayu, ino katayangku, kunnangke ino kemulanino bukal. Se nu ammena memula, mittata pelang. Udde nu memula e madaral, mammunga si oddu.
Nu ikalowino tolayino biyangnga sito lubag, matekappena. Udde nu ammena ikalowino biyangnga sito lubag, mabiyangnga si makkikiyad.
Nu inyeno manggamma masserbi sikwak, dumandan nad sikwak, takesi massiki sintawino agyanangku, antu kappayino agyananna. E amminira a masserbi sikwak, dayawannirana i Ama.”

Sinapikkappayi Jesus si, “Sitoya, makukungkulino nakangku, e sannadeno sapitangku? Adasi arangngangku si, ‘Ama, iliꞌwanaꞌngad sitawa makwana sikwak’? Ammena dama, se antuweno gakkagguwa inangngan sito lubag.”
